name: Eye See in Color Clean Multidimensional Eyeshadow Palette
about: What it is:A collection of highly pigmented, rich, buttery, blendable quad eyeshadow palettes, with four curated shades in each, made to customize for every occasion...Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:These eyeshadow quads were color curated to easily create complete eye looks in just one palette—from everyday nude to amped up smoky. The blendable, creamy, no-crease formulas give ultra-rich color payoff in buttery, multidimensional finishes, and can be applied with fingers or brushes. The eyeshadows feature a clean, vegan, and cruelty-free formula..This Palette Contains:
ingredients: Faithful To Freedom: .Mica, Silica, Zinc Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Squalane. May Contain/Peut Contenir: Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140).         ..I Was in Love: .Mica, Silica, Zinc Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Squalane. May Contain/Peut Contenir: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Ultramarines (Ci 77007), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742).                 .                                        .Covered in Shells:.Mica, Silica, Zinc Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Squalane. May Contain/Peut Contenir: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Ultramarines (Ci 77007).                         .                                                                        .Obsessed:.Mica, Zinc Stearate, Silica, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Squalane. May Contain/Peut Contenir: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Ultramarines (Ci 77007), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140).....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Using fingers, gently brush eyeshadows onto finger pads and press onto lids. .-Or apply to eyes with a fluffy brush and blend for a soft, diffused look. .-For more color intensity, press onto lids with a flat brush. ..Follow along or make your own rules, each quad has been custom curated to create a full eye look:.-Top Left: Highlight. Use this shade beneath the brow bone and inner corners of the lid..-Top Right: Crease. Use this shade to define and add dimension to the crease of the eye. .-Bottom Left: Lid. Use this shade in the center of the eyelid for a gorgeous spotlight effect. .-Bottom Right: Definition. Use this shade on the outer corners of the lid and blend into the outside of the crease, or blend along the upper and lower lash line for a smoky look. ..Refill Product Instructions:.-This product was designed to be refillable. .-Gently pull up on the top of the inner tray near the mirror to remove..-Push the replacement into place until it clicks. .-Please check back for updates on the launch of GXVE’s refillable eyeshadow shades...All GXVE Beauty outer boxes are 100% recyclable. Our primary containers are made with sustainable materials, including 30% or higher PCR (post-consumer recycled) plastic or glass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The GXVE Eyeshadow Palette is a solid addition to my makeup collection! The pigmentation is impressive, and the colors blend effortlessly, creating stunning looks that last all day. I love the variety of shades, which range from bold to neutral, making it versatile for both everyday wear and more dramatic looks. The only reason I’m giving it four stars instead of five is that some shades have a bit of fallout, but it's nothing a good primer can’t fix. Overall, the quality and color payoff make this palette well worth trying!

I’ve been wanting to try GXVE for a long time so I was excited to receive this product. The palette I received was simple kind of life - nudes with matte and shimmer. Very pigmented colors and very easy to blend. Another highlight is longevity. Even without an eyeshadow primer, these shades stay vibrant and crease-free for hours, making them perfect for long days or nights. I love that I don’t need to worry about touch-ups, even when I’m out and about. The palette itself is sleek and compact, which is great for travel or for keeping in my purse for quick touch-ups. Despite its portable size, there’s a generous amount of product, so it’s a palette that lasts. While it’s priced higher than some drugstore options, the investment is worth it. The combination of richly pigmented, long-lasting shades and overall versatility makes this palette a must-have for anyone who enjoys playing with different looks. If you’re looking for a high-quality, multifunctional eyeshadow palette, the GXVE 'Eye See In Color' in “Make Me Like You” is an excellent choice, especially if, like me, you love experimenting with your eye makeup at any age. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a 30-year-old beauty enthusiast living in Los Angeles with dry and sensitive skin, I’m always on the lookout for eyeshadows that deliver both quality and comfort. This palette is a beautiful mix of neutral shades that are perfect for everyday wear. The colors are soft yet pigmented enough to make an impact, offering a natural look that enhances your eyes without being too dramatic. ether I’m going for a subtle daytime look or something a bit more polished for the evening, this palette has become a go-to in my makeup routine. The shadows are smooth and velvety, with minimal fallout. The shimmer shades have just the right amount of sparkle without being overwhelming, adding a touch of glam to any look. While the shades are beautiful and versatile, they lean more towards the subtle side. If you’re someone who prefers bold, vibrant colors, this palette might not provide the intensity you’re looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try the GXVE Eye See in Color Eyeshadow Palette in Simple Kind of Life, and while the shades are gorgeous and versatile, there are a few issues that hold it back. The colors are richly pigmented and blend smoothly, allowing for looks, from subtle to bold. However, I noticed that the eyeshadow has more powder fallout than I anticipated. It tends to settle under my eyes during application, which can be frustrating, especially when I'm in a hurry. Thankfully, it cleans up easily with a swipe of micellar water, but it does add an extra step to my routine. Overall, it’s a decent palette with beautiful colors, but the fallout is something to consider if you’re looking for a more seamless experience. Because of this I give it a 3 star rating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the opportunity to try the GXVE Beauty Multidimensional Eyeshadow Palette in Make Me Like You.  As a beauty content creator and professional makeup artist, I've tested a wide range of eyeshadows over the years.This palette delivers solid quality. While it's not groundbreaking or introducing anything entirely new, it performs well for what it promises.  The shimmers are the standout feature—they're best applied with your fingers and add just the right amount of sparkle to your look.  The mattes, while not the absolute best, blend smoothly and stay in place. The color payoff could be a bit stronger. The compact itself is beautiful, and I  appreciate the full-sized mirror—it's not one of those tiny ones. Though this palette may not revolutionize your routine, I do recommend it as a travel-friendly option. It offers a good selection of shades, allowing you to create both casual day looks and bold evening styles.   This review has been collected as part of a promotion.

I can see myself using this product very often.  You can use only this palette to create a full eye look instead of having to use multiple palettes for one look. They easily blend to create seamless looks. And they don’t crease! I love that it’s clean ingredients, vegan, gluten free, and has recyclable  packaging. I definitely recommend this eyeshadow palette to try yourself and see! I think this should be a staple in everyone’s makeup collection.

reviews.review_text: The shimmers in this palette are absolutely stunning. I have traveled with it no bulky packaging and it easily fits into my purse or overnight bag. The warm pinks and nudes create versatile looks. The mattes are buttery and blend easy. I can see myself using this daily instead of drudging through several of my eye palletes, this makes quick application a breeze. I complete my looks in less than 10 munutes. I apply the mattes with a brush and the shimmers with my finger. You could also apply with a wet brush to make these shimmers even more intense. You can also use some of the shades as a blush. Overall I'm really enjoying it. I want to get the Simple Kind Of Life Palette too. I hope there will be more color stories in this line that come out in the future!

The colors are amazing and I love that I can go from an everyday look to a nighttime look in seconds! Absolutely loved this pallet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gxve Beauty Palette  The Gxve Beauty Palette, Make Me Like You, is a great little palette to create day to night looks. The eye shadows are pigmented, so go in with a light hand.  They do blend out nicely.   The eye shadow shade in the bigger pan I was able to use  as a blush.  It’s a pretty peachy matte tone.  I do like the color story, and that they included matte shades, as well as shimmer, glitter shades for a variety of looks.   I do wish it didn’t have so much kick up.  It’s gets really dusty when I go in with the brush for some color, and when blending out, there is a lot of fallout.  You definitely want to do your eye makeup first, before your foundation.  The glittery shades are really nice but with the fallout, I had glitter all over my face!   The two glittery shades at first do look very similar but they are indeed different.  One shade is a copper shade while the other glitter shade is more of a pinkish shade.  I would have preferred a different shade instead of the copper one.   The size of the palette is small, perfect for travel or for a minimalist.  The small palette does have a nice sized mirror which is great, cause I always forget to grab a mirror.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Make Me Like You palette has lately been my go-to. It’s the perfect pallet for an everyday look. The compact palette has 6 colors that are versatile enough to complement any skin tone. The formula is so easy to work with, it is vibrant and pigmented but so easily blendable and buildable. It is also a no-crease formula, which I’m loving as I'm getting older.  Since the palette is compact it is perfect for travel. I have been tossing it in my bag and taking it to work. After work, I can easily touch up  my eye makeup and transition to a bold, evening look for a night out with friends. With the mix of matte and glittery shades in one, it’s great for experimenting with different styles and getting creative. On a side note, I love that GXVE is a clean, vegan, gluten-free and cruelty-free company.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for the Gwen Stefani GXVE Eyeshadow Palette, but unfortunately, it didn’t live up to my expectations. The biggest issue for me was how glittery and powdery the shades were. If you’re used to working with high-quality eyeshadows, this palette may disappoint you.  The metallic shadows, in particular, were a struggle. They were too powdery, and the glitter fallout was a mess—ending up under my eyes and all over my face. It’s more suited for someone who’s new to makeup or loves a lot of glitter, but if you’re looking for precision and a polished look, this might not be the palette for you.  On a positive note, the case design is pretty cool, and I do appreciate the quote on the mirror. However, despite the nice packaging, the overall performance left me feeling underwhelmed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The color selection of this palette is great for everyday use! You get a good mix of matte and shimmer shades, all leaning on the cooler side. I love that there’s nothing too wild in here—just a range of wearable shades that are perfect for work and school. The mattes blend easily and aren’t overly pigmented, so you can build them up without going overboard. The shimmers are gorgeous, they look incredibly sparkly rather than icy or foiled. They're very easy to build up if you want something more dramatic.  These shades work very well together, so if you are new to eyeshadow it's hard to go wrong when using this palette! These tones are also really flattering for my cool olive skin, they don't have too much gray in them so they don't wash me out as other cool tones tend to do. As for wear time, they hold up pretty well throughout the day. I didn’t notice any major creasing or fading, which is always a concern with eyeshadows. I do use a primer, so that definitely helps, but overall, I’m happy with how they last. If you're in the market for a new basic, easy to wear palette, this is it!  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_text: I use a have a TON of eyeshadow palettes so if I find myself reaching for one a lot I know it’s worth talking about. This GXVE eyeshadow palette is full of such easy to use shadows. That pack a punch but blend out so nicely and don’t cake up. No settling into the creases here either!! I love the layout and find it to be two cohesive palettes in one. I love the color stories and find them so easy to put my look together. These shadows last all through the day and don’t dry out or irritate my sensitive eyelids. I love the black!! It is a BLACK black and wonderful to work with!! Fallout is not an issue and I don’t find them to be overly powdery either. I really think these are beginner friendly and colors that would compliment ANYONE!! This palette gets a yes from me!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Make Me Like You - matte & shimmer peach & rose gold
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I haven't tried anything from GXVE Beauty that I have disliked! This brand really seems to make nice quality products! The Eye See In Color Palette in Make Me Like You has a beautiful array of neutral pink based colors. I really love that this palette has a set of warm colors and a set of cool colors. I find that most palettes contain colors that are only warm or only cool, and if you want to make a different toned look you have to buy separate palettes. This is perfect for people who like to use both types of colors! The quality of the shadows are very nice! The shimmers go on very easily and pigmented. They do have a bit of glitter, but it's very fine so there isn't a ton of fallout. All the other matte shades are very nice and creamy (with the exception of the lightest pink shade - this seemed a little less creamy than the others), and they all blend really easily! Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this small compact palette! It is the perfect size for travel,  and still holds a good amount of shades! These neutrals are amazing and seem to really compliment my cool skin tones, while I think it would also look good with warm skin tones.  When applying, I noticed very little fallout,  and the color packs on like butter! I don't have to keep applying in order to get results.  I also love how well it blends out,  and does not appear patchy or anything like that.  This one is definitely a new favorite of mine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love neutral palettes and have been looking for good travel palettes. This one is a really nice, compact palette that gives you a lot of options for its size.  The layout of the palette is great because it’s the size and shape of a quad, but you actually get six colors because of the “split pan” setup. This allows you a lot of versatility because you get two neutral mattes, two liner shades, and two shimmer/glitter colors.  As for formulas, the matte formula is great. The mattes are soft and bendable and easy to work with. The shimmer/metallic formulas are quite a bit more difficult. They are difficult to pick up with a brush, and I cannot pick them up at all with synthetic or combo bristles, only natural (undyed goat) hair. The natural hair brush must be a builder/laydown type of brush with a fair amount of density, and even then, the brush can only pick up a little bit of product, just enough to add a bit of sparkle to my lids. I also tried to use my finger, and while I was able to pick up product more easily this way, the formula adhered to my lids in a heavy metallic way. I’m still trying to find a happy medium between slight sparkle and full opaque metallic. The packaging exceeded my expectations. The plastic feels high end, weighty, and durable. I generally prefer magnetic closures, but the closure on this has a satisfying snap and it is easy to both open and close. I also love the lid and how the white and gold “GXVE” logos are on different levels - it really gives the packaging dimension. This is a great travel palette that is neutral and versatile and would suit anyone with very warm toned skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It was so hard to choose between the two GXVE Eye See in Color Clean Multidimensional Eyeshadow Palettes, but ultimately I had to go with the cool-toned Simple Kind of Life to complement my complexion’s cool undertones. This palette reminds me of an upgraded version of the ones I’d carry in high school and college to achieve glam rock looks. The neutral mattes are subtle yet pigmented and create a smooth base for the shimmers. These can be packed on to create a foil effect or blended out for a more diffuse shimmer. You can even use the dark Cat’s Meow shade as a liner by applying it with a small angled brush. The mattes can be a little cakey if not blended well, but that’s really the only drawback I’ve noticed so far. I’m keeping this in my makeup bag for all-in-one eye looks on demand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion. This is my first time trying GXVE brand. I like the color palette and how it’s a nice sleek compact palette. The colors are great for every day wear! The pigmentation for this palette is out of this world. You just need a little dab of your brush or your finger and it’s super pigmented. I find that I didn’t need to pack on a lot to build the color up as it was very pigmented. I wore the eyeshadow for about 8 hours several days a week and it stayed on well. Of course with proper prep before applying the eyeshadow is what kept it long lasting for me. I deducted one star because even though it’s very pigmented, there was lots of fallout, pigment smeared all over the palette, and kind of wasted some eyeshadow pigment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re on the hunt for a versatile eyeshadow palette that effortlessly transitions from day to night, look no further than the Simple Kind of Life palette by GXVE! This quad is a dream come true for makeup lovers, offering a perfect blend of matte and shimmer shades that are buttery, blendable, and oh-so-pigmented.   The palette features four curated shades that are ideal for creating a soft, contoured look or a bold, dramatic eye. Whether you’re going for a natural daytime vibe or a sultry evening look, this palette has got you covered. The shades are rich and buildable, making it easy to customize your look for any occasion.   One of the standout features of this palette is its versatility. Not only does it work wonders as an eyeshadow, but it also doubles as a contour palette! Talk about a multi-tasking marvel.  Plus, it’s clean, vegan, and cruelty-free, so you can feel good about using it.   Pair it with a bold red lip for that classic Gwen Stefani look, or keep it neutral for a polished, everyday style.  Either way, you’ll feel like a rockstar with this palette in your makeup arsenal. Highly recommend for both makeup newbies and seasoned pros alike!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the opportunity to try the new GXVE Make Me Like You eyeshadow palette, and I must say, it impressed me greatly. this palette has proven to be a valuable addition to my collection.One of the standout features of this palette is its ease of use, especially for those who are new to makeup. The palette includes a range of natural, neutral colors that are not only highly pigmented but also blend effortlessly. This makes it perfect for creating a clean, everyday look with minimal effort.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello, I'm Ludin Mendez, a Beautytap enthusiast. I'm writing to you because I've tried several times to leave my review of the GXVE By Gwen Stefani Make Me Like You eyeshadow palette on the Sephora website and I get an error every time I try to send my review. I'm writing this because today was the deadline for my review and I don't want this error to hurt me. I look forward to your response.

reviews.review_title: a great palette for a beginner
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is a really beautiful palette and it includes all the colors I need either for a natural everyday look or to bump it up for a night out. the matte colors are buildable and blend nicely. the mattes don't come off super strong with the first pass but it does build. this would be a great palette for a beginner or intermediate makeup learner because it's hard to overdo it with these shadows. the sparkle does need a wet brush or setting spray on your brush to really make it pop, but if you want a soft wash of color a dry brush will do.   It fits great in my makeup bag and the mirror is a plus for travel. the packaging is done really really well and I see it being durable and holding up to the test of time. I love the amount of detail that was put into this product. not just the formula, but the packaging as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably one of the most beautiful eyeshadow palettes that I ever had, the colors blends like butter nice and easily, the shimmer eyeshadow is to die for, they look so nice. I’m in love with the color selection on this palette, so I can wear it all year around they’re neutral with warm tones which works amazing in my skin tone.  The formula is really good, the matte ones don’t look patchy and are very pigmented, they stay intact without any touch up almost 6 hours which is enough for me. Since the eyeshadows are very pigmented you don’t need to apply too much on the brush, the packaging is very cute and compact. The mirror is a plus since a lot of palettes don’t have it, it’s really compact so you can carry it on your purse and make touch ups.

I am a beauty, skincare and fragrance enthusiast. I have recently been trying GXVE’s Make Me Like You eyeshadow palette. I have really been enjoying using it. The colors and matte and glittery/shimmy. The lighter colors are a little dusty but are pigmented. The darker matte colors are extremely pigmented, but were easy to blend and not dusty. The glitter also wears well and applied smoothly. All of the eyeshadows lasted a decently long time. I also really like the case that comes with it. It solid but not super luxurious. The shadow sizes are just right- being are bigger, and the less used ones, Saturday. I love the peachy/rosy tones in the pallets.   I would recommend this to anyone looking for a pretty neutral, new eyeshadow palette. It’s a great product. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so excited about this gorgeous eyeshadow palette by GXVE! The Simple Kind of Life palette is a fantastic collection of neutral shades, perfect for creating stunning everyday makeup looks. I love all the shades, but “Settle Down” is my favorite because it’s a beautiful medium tone that’s perfect for any occasion. For a fancier look, I adore “Return of Saturn” and “Angel Wink,” both featuring a stunning shimmer.  The palette is compact and lightweight, making it easy to carry in my makeup bag. The buttery texture of the eyeshadows feels great on the eyes, and they blend effortlessly, providing high pigmentation for a vibrant finish.  I also appreciate that this eyeshadow palette is made with clean ingredients, ensuring it's gentle on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has very good pigmentation and beautiful colors, I have already tried it and they last a long time and are blendable.

I’ve been using this product for about two weeks and I’ve tried so many different styles with this pallet and they all came out very and pigmented. The colors are a little light but you can still see it very well. My favorite colors are the darker colors for sure I like to do Smokey eyes they come out very pretty when I do them. The glittery colors very shiny and I really love that about those   If you’re into a glittery look I they recommend this product.  I have noticed it’s been on sale a lot and I would definitely purchase if it stays on sale and they don’t change the ingredients in this product you’re definitely gonna like this if you like pink colors you don’t need a lot a little goes a long way. This is perfect for a Smokey eye look. I highly recommend

reviews.review_title: A Versatile, Everyday Essential for Effortless Eye
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who loves experimenting with makeup but also values simplicity, the GXVE EYE SEE IN COLOR Clean Multidimensional Eyeshadow Palette in 'SIMPLE KIND OF LIFE' quickly became a go-to in my routine. The palette's curated shades make it easy to create anything from a soft daytime look to a more dramatic evening eye, all with just one product. Over the past couple of weeks, I found myself reaching for this palette almost daily. The formulas are a dream to work with—creamy, blendable, and highly pigmented, delivering a rich color payoff that stays put throughout the day. I particularly appreciated how the shadows didn’t crease or fade, even on my oily lids. The mix of mattes and shimmers provides great versatility, allowing me to play around with different textures and finishes. Plus, the fact that it's clean, vegan, and cruelty-free makes it all the more appealing. The experience of applying these shadows is truly enjoyable. The subtle shimmer in the shades adds a touch of elegance without being too overpowering, making it perfect for both everyday wear and special occasions. If you're looking for a reliable, easy-to-use eyeshadow palette that offers both simplicity and the potential for creativity, this one’s a solid choice.  **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: Pigmented, blends easily, minimal fall out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good neutral eyeshadow palette and this “Simple Kind of Life” palette by GXVE checks every box for me. Each shade is truly pigmented, which is super important to me because if you’re gonna wear eyeshadow, it needs to stand out. Even the lighter shades had no trouble showing up and popping with a nice highlight. Next, there is minimal to no fallout when applying with an eyeshadow brush for 90% of the shades, although I did notice a little more crumbly nature to the metallic shimmer shades. They’re still beautiful, I just have to be more mindful. Last, they blend easily both with each other and with other eyeshadow that I own which makes this palette a huge win for the neutral girlie looking for some easy base shades. I highly recommend it! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a dedicated Beauty Tap Enthusiast for almost three years, and I am honored to share my professional insights regarding GXVE's exceptional makeup products.  Their eyeshadow palette comprises six versatile shades meticulously designed for the eyelid, upper lid, and crease, enabling the creation of diverse makeup looks. The formula is remarkably soft and smooth, ensuring effortless application with either your fingers or a brush. Minimal fallout and intense color payoff guarantee a flawless makeup experience. While the color palette may not align with my personal preferences, it does not diminish the exceptional quality of the eyeshadow.  I wholeheartedly recommend GXVE's eyeshadow palette to makeup enthusiasts seeking unparalleled quality and versatility.  This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am an eyeshadow lover and I have tried many different brands over the years. I am very picky about eyeshadows these days because the current formulas are so amazing. The GXVE palette Make Me Like You is a beautiful palette that has a great selection of neutral shades that are warm toned. The formula of each shade feels so buttery and soft. The shimmery shades are so gorgeous on the eyes and do not have any fallout. The matte shades are so soft and so easy to blend out. I love that I can create a variety of neutral looks with this palette and I can add a pop of shimmer. The formula definitely compares with my more luxurious palettes and I love this palette. I love the color story and that it’s so easy to use if I need to get ready quickly. It lasts all day and stays put even when I’m sweaty. I love the compact size of this palette and how perfect it is for vacations. This is a great palette because the formula is so soft and the shades blend out so nicely. This review was as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this eyeshadow palette. The colors are very pigmented and give amazing color payoff. The glitter eyeshadows also looked great and were comfortable to wear. The black eyeshadow was also a true black and not a weird off grey. You have the perfect colors for a neutral or Smokey eye look. It looks great and these eyeshadows can layer without getting murky or pilling. I also like how I don’t need to go in with primer at the beginning as I get the desired look as the colors still show up well. I have created so many amazing looks and gotten many compliments on these looks. The base color is also great and these tones aren’t ashy and don’t make me look washed out. I have brown eyes and these shades really work for my eyes and make them pop. Overall I love this eyeshadow palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the packaging of this palette. It’s sleek and compact, making it perfect for travel. The color story is a nice take on colorful neutrals, allowing ease for a work friendly eye look. The formula is buildable, but a little powdery for my liking; I prefer palettes that are more pigmented. I also wish that there was a deeper shade in the palette because the darkest shade barely shows up on me. Anyone that’s darker than me would need to use this palette in conjunction with something else to achieve eye looks. Overall the product is nice, but not a must have, especially for the price.   This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In my makeup routine, eye makeup is my most important step that I paid most attention to. Eye is a window to your soul and I feels like a small change to the eye makeup and really make a big impact.   I'm so excited to be gifted by GXVE in exchange for my honest review. I really like this pallete because it gives all the difference shades, matt and shimmers. So many combinations that you can create many look of make up no make up routine. I can create a natural look all the way to a bold neutral look. It's just so versatile and compact to carry with you throughout the day. One of the important eye makeup for me is smudging. Especially the hot days in the summer. GXVE did not smudge on me so I'm going to give it a passing grade. I'm absolutely happy with my pallete and will continue to use it.   This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So I have been a fan of Gwen’s makeup line for a while now and this eyeshadow is simply gorgeous. The black is always my go to with eyeshadow and this one is so bold. The formula is so creamy and silky it glides on smooth across the eye lid and doesn’t crease. By mixing some of those colors together you will get a nice seductive smoky eye. You even have a couple of shimmer tones too. And of course can’t forget to mention the beautiful mirror it has.  I just love how all her makeup is so bold!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a makeup enthusiast and I recently tried the GXVE MAKE ME LIKE YOU eyeshadow palette, and I must say, it's quite impressive.  The palette features six versatile shades that cater to a variety of looks, from subtle daytime to bold evening styles. The pigmentation is remarkable - each color applies vibrantly with minimal effort.  What truly stands out is the texture. The shadows are wonderfully smooth, blending seamlessly for a professional finish. I'm also pleased with their longevity; my eye makeup remains intact throughout the day.  It's worth noting that the formula is vegan and cruelty-free, which is a significant plus for conscientious consumers.  Overall, I find this palette to be a worthwhile investment. It offers quality, versatility, and ethical production - a combination that's hard to beat in today's makeup market. I'd highly recommend giving it a try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty and makeup enthusiast, I was super happy to try this palette for many reasons. First, I find the design very unique and the amounts of each shade of eyeshadow perfect. Second, the size of this palette allows me to carry it everywhere easily. So, to start, I must say that I liked the packaging, which also comes with a mirror, and although these shadows have very good pigmentation in the dark colors, I personally would have loved for the lighter shade to have the same pigmentation. However, I must say that these colors are very versatile and go with everything! Especially for the fall season that is so close. This palette is definitely great for beginners in makeup and for every lady who needs a palette in her purse, it is also very easy to blend! I will continue to use it and I recommend it for make up lovers! This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a big fan of old school Gwen Stefani, but I shouldn’t have been expecting old school Gwen in these palettes. These shades are beautiful, but they’re on the simpler side. Nothing wrong with that, at all though! I have plenty of bold shades, and this ended up being a really wonderful palette. They’re not sheer shades, they are very pigmented which I love! I also really like that this palette is the size that it is, because I can easily toss this in my bag and touch up throughout the day when needed! The shimmery shades are my personal favorites, but the mattes are beautiful too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a makeup enthusiast and I've got to spill about my latest makeup crush - the GXVE MAKE ME LIKE YOU eyeshadow palette! This little beauty has been rocking my world since I got my hands on it.  First things first - can we talk about these colors? With six stunning shades, this palette is like a treasure chest of possibilities. I'm totally obsessed with how I can create so many different looks, from soft and subtle for my 9-to-5, to bold and dramatic for those nights when I'm feeling extra. And let me tell you, these colors don't play - they show up and show out with amazing pigmentation. One swipe and I'm in love!  The texture of these shadows? Pure heaven. They feel like butter on my lids, blending like a dream. No more patchy, uneven eyeshadow struggles - these beauties melt into each other effortlessly. Whether I'm going for a quick wash of color or a full-on glam look, it's always smooth sailing.  What's really won me over is how these shadows last. From my morning coffee run to post-work drinks, my eye look stays put without creasing. It's like magic!  For my girls with sensitive skin, this palette is a total win. It's vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free, so you can feel good about what you're putting on your face. Plus, the packaging is recyclable - hello, eco-friendly glam!  I love how versatile this palette is. Sometimes I'll use my fingers for a quick application, and other times I'll break out the brushes when I'm channeling my inner makeup artist. Either way, it always looks fab.  Bottom line? The GXVE MAKE ME LIKE YOU palette with its six gorgeous shades has become my secret weapon for eyes that wow. It's like having a whole eyeshadow wardrobe in one sleek package. If you're thinking about treating yourself, do it! Trust me, this palette will have you falling in love with your makeup all over again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello my name is Jacquie. I am a freelance makeup artist and beauty content creator of five plus years. This pallet is something to talk about. These colors are the perfect autumn/fall vibe love that they can be subtle or full glam. This eye shadow pallet  is super pigmented and It didn’t have much fall out on the pan. Some of the colors are a bit similar but they are so gorgeous that I am not even going to complain. The packaging is stunning as well. This eyeshadow wears well. I can create an amazing Smokey eye with this and that glitter my gosh that glitter sticks! I also used the brown for my brows and to contour this is the perfect little multipurpose pallet. This pallet is very beginner friendly as the color sticks so well to the brush and your skin. I honestly didn’t even have to use a brush this shadow can be pressed right on with your finger. The formula is amazing. You get your moneys worth with this. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a makeup artist, I’m always on the lookout for palettes that can elevate a look, and the GXVE “Simple Kind of Life” eye-shadow palette piqued my interest. First off, let’s talk packaging—this palette definitely has an upscale feel. Its design is sleek and elegant, giving it a high-end vibe that feels both luxurious and stylish.  Now, onto the shades. The metallic tones in this palette are stunningly pigmented. They really pop and deliver a beautiful shimmer that’s perfect for a standout smokey eye. However, the lighter shades were a bit of a letdown for me. They came off a bit powdery and didn't show up as well as I hoped—though to be fair, I didn’t use an eyeshadow base, so that could be part of the issue.  One quirky thing I noticed was a slightly odd smell when first opening the palette. Thankfully, once the shadows are on the brush, that scent dissipates and doesn’t linger.  In terms of staying power, the performance was just okay. By the end of the day, most of the shadow had faded away, which was a bit disappointing. Despite this, I’m willing to give it another go. The variety of colors offers a lot of versatility for both smokey and natural looks, making it a decent option for different makeup styles.   While it won’t be a staple in my makeup bag just yet, the palette’s potential is worth exploring further.

reviews.review_title: Versatile warm tones in a compact package!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great, compact little palette for warm-toned eye looks. What I love most about it is the versatility. You can mix and match the shades for a peachy-pink look, a more golden-bronze look, or an all-matte look. The mattes blend out effortlessly and the shimmers are eye-catching and buildable. If you're in the market for warm tones, this is your one-stop-shop eyeshadow palette!

reviews.review_title: Blendable Warm Toned Eye Shadow Palette
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a huge cosmetics lover, I was very excited to try out the Multidimensional Eyeshadow Palette “Make Me Like You” GXVE by Gwen Stefani! This is a buttery, smooth, and bendable quad eyeshadow palette with matte and shimmery peach shades and rose gold color. The shades appeared to be more warmer toned shades to me. The eyeshadows blended extremely well just using my finger or eyeshadow without any creasing but honestly didn’t give me the high pigmentation I was hoping for. The shades were not as pigmented as I thought and the colors faded pretty quickly without eye shadow primer or something to give the eyeshadow colors more staying power. I did however like that the eye shadow palette is a clean beauty product that vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging. Overall, this is a good eyeshadow palette with ultra, smooth, bendable eyeshadow shades but not it is not highly pigmented and the shades don’t last long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a promotion in exchange for my honest review. I received the Simple Kind of Life eyeshadow palette. For reference, I have lighter to pale skin with blue eyes. I tend to gravitate towards layered/blending eye shadows and sparkles, so this was perfect for me! The colors are beautiful and can be worn on their own or paired together to blend. The two larger shades are perfect as a base - either on the eyelid or the lighter color can be used above the eyelid to the eyebrow. You can make a smoky eye look or a light makeup look for a day at the office. I found that these shades did not have issues with fading or pigment problems throughout the day. The color stayed put. I cannot wait to try out the other palettes that this brand has!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion. I recently tried the GXVE Make Me Like You eyeshadow palette, and it has truly exceeded my expectations! The color selection is absolutely stunning, offering what I like to say is a versatile range of shades that are perfect for both day and night looks. ETA: Me and my 9 year old daughter had a blast using this palette to do her and my makeup both. We both have fair color skin and you can see how pretty these colors are on her lighter skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. the colors go on so smoothly and last a long time. These colors are super vibrant, definitely worth getting for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the GXVE Eye See in Color Eyeshadow Palette in the Make Me Like You shades, and I am thoroughly impressed! The packaging is absolutely stunning and sets the tone for a premium experience. Having previously used GXVE's lipstick and lip liner, I had high expectations, and this eyeshadow palette certainly did not disappoint.   The color payoff is exceptional, with each shade delivering vibrant and true-to-pan hues. The formula is incredibly blendable, making it easy to achieve both natural, everyday looks and more dramatic, evening styles. This palette's versatility is truly remarkable—it's perfect for any makeup routine, whether you're aiming for a subtle glow or a bold statement. Overall, GXVE continues to impress with their high-quality products, and this eyeshadow palette is no exception.  This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is just alright to me. The shades are pigmented and blendable. The formula is extremely soft, which leads to the pan getting messy easily and quite a bit of fall out when applying. None of this is necessarily a problem, but isn’t my personal preference. The packaging is pretty and I like the unique shape of the pans, but the lid is really difficult to open. The glitters are stunning, but they are just that: true glitters. They do contain larger glitter particles and are best applied with a finger rather than a brush. I think the color story of this palette is interesting. I have shade Make Me Like You, and the tones feel a bit…outdated? The shade that appears bright orange is particularly baffling to me. Overall, a decent product, but nothing exceptional given today’s market.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Make Me Like You - matte & shimmer peach & rose gold
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shimmers in this palette are absolutely stunning! I have taken this palette with me during travel and it’s perfect. No bulky packaging fits easily in my purse or overnight bag. The warm pinks and nudes create versatile looks. Overall I have really enjoyed using it and would like to get the Simple Kind Of Life Palette.

reviews.review_title: GXVE EYE SEE IN COLOR: SIMPLE KIND OF LIFE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast and makeup lover, I always enjoy trying new eyeshadow palettes and since I had yet to try any shadows from GXVE I was extra excited to try the Eye See in Color Simple Kind of Life palette. Typically I lean more towards warm toned shadows, however this palette features slightly cooler tones so it was a bit out of my comfort zone, but they still worked well with my skin tone. I love the sleek, modern packaging. The shadows come packaged in a compact with a mirror that makes it perfect if you'd like to take it on the go. The shadows themselves are pretty pigmented and I experience minimal fallout when applying, however they did seem a bit soft in the compact as in there was a lot of product powder each time I went to pick up product with my brush so I had to be very light handed to ensure I didn't waste too much product. I appreciate that the colors in this palette are versatile in the aspect that you can do a more subtle or more dramatic look just by switching up which shades you use along with your application technique. These shadows also blended fairly easily for me as well, though I did have to put a little extra effort in with the darker tones. All in all, it's a nice palette that would work lovely whether you want a neutral everyday look or if you prefer to go a bit more glam and do a full-on smokey eye.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a Pro MUA who loves testing and giving new brands and products a chance. I'm all about simplicity but make it luxe. You never know what product can be a staple in your kit.   The eyeshadow pallet by GXVE comes in a beautiful package - the team didn't hold back on giving it a prestige look. I was excited about the thought of throwing the compact pallet into my work or travel bag for when I want a simple eye look.   That thought quickly changed once I played in the actual product.   The pallet has 6 shades in total : 4 matte colors and 2 shimmers. The shades are beautiful but because there's so much dusty kickback with the mattes, it takes a lot to be pigmented and doesn't blend well. The shimmers are really pretty - not glittery and stays in place. You have to apply it a few times for it to show up on the eyelid.   The stars are for packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently started doing my makeup and putting on more eyeshadow. I have to be honest at first it was a lot using the black shade but I love how it all comes together to give a smoky eye look. The glitter really helps the darker colors pop. These colors on this palette help bring out my brown eye color as well. I am also a big fan at the size of this palette and the amount of color choices there are. Also a big plus that it has a mirror so it’s easy to carry around and pull it out to give a touch up when necessary.  *This review was collected as a part of a promotion*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GXVE’s Eye See in Color Eyeshadow Palette in Simple Kind of Life has quickly become a favorite in my makeup routine, thanks to its impressive new formula and color selection. reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a makeup enthusiast, I was excited to try the GXVE Eye See In Color Eyeshadow Palette in Make Me Like You, overall, it's a solid addition to any makeup collection. The palette features six versatile shades, ranging from everyday neutrals to deep, smoky tones. It offers a mix of four matte and two shimmer shades, making it easy to create soft, natural looks and more dramatic, bold styles—all from one compact palette.  One of the standout features for me is the formula. The eyeshadows are creamy, blendable, and surprisingly pigmented. The mattes layer and blend beautifully, offering smooth transitions between shades, while the shimmers have a rich, buttery texture that delivers an eye-catching pop of sparkle. I recommend applying the shimmer shades with your fingers; they adhere well and give an intense color payoff that doesn't crease throughout the day.  The palette itself is sleek and sturdy, complete with a full-sized mirror, making it a great option for travel. It's lightweight and compact enough to toss in your bag without feeling bulky but still substantial enough to feel high-quality.  I noticed some kickback in the pan when dipping into the matte shades, but I was pleased to find that there wasn't any fallout on the eyes, and the colors held up well throughout the day without fading.  Overall, while the GXVE Make Me Like You palette may not offer anything revolutionary, it delivers on its promises of being multidimensional, ultra-blendable, and versatile. If you're looking for a reliable, all-in-one palette that can take you from a natural day look to a sultry evening glam, this one is definitely worth considering. Plus, the fact that it's clean, vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free is a nice bonus!  This review has been collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_text: This palette is perfect for anyone who values convenience without compromising on quality. If you’re someone who wants a no-fuss, go-to palette that can take you from a day at the office to a night out, Simple Kind of Life has  you covered. Its blendable, creamy formulas are ideal for those who want high-impact pigment with minimal effort. And for the conscious consumer, it’s clean, vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free, making it a guilt-free addition to your collection.  I have to say, I’m genuinely impressed with this palette. The shades are beautifully curated, making it easy to create a cohesive look without feeling overwhelmed by too many choices. The formula is a dream to work with—it glides on smoothly, blends like a dream, and stays put all day long. I also appreciate how it caters to all skill levels; whether I’m in a rush and just need a quick swipe of color or I want to spend more time crafting a detailed look, this palette delivers every time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the opportunity to try the GXVE Beauty Multidimensional Eyeshadow Palette in Make Me Like You.  As a beauty content creator and professional makeup artist, I've tested a wide range of eyeshadows over the years.This palette delivers solid quality. While it's not groundbreaking or introducing anything entirely new, it performs well for what it promises.  The shimmers are the standout feature—they're best applied with your fingers and add just the right amount of sparkle to your look.  The mattes, while not the absolute best, blend smoothly and stay in place. The color payoff could be a bit stronger. The compact itself is beautiful, and appreciate the inclusion of a full-sized mirror—it's not one of those tiny ones. Though this palette may not revolutionize your routine, I do recommend it as a travel-friendly option. It offers a selection of shades, allowing you to create both casual day looks and bold evening styles.  This review has been collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the GXVE Simple Kind of Life Multidimensional Eyeshadow Palette, and it has quickly become a staple in my makeup collection. The palette offers a beautiful range of neutral shades, perfect for creating both everyday and more dramatic looks. The pigmentation is impressive, providing rich color payoff with just one swipe. Each shadow blends effortlessly, making it easy to achieve a seamless gradient effect. I also appreciate the minimal fallout, which keeps my makeup looking clean and polished. The wear time is excellent, with the colors staying true and vibrant throughout the day. The clean, cruelty-free formula is an added bonus, making this palette a guilt-free choice for conscious beauty lovers. Overall, I highly recommend this palette for its versatility, quality, and stunning finish.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful everyday shades, love the packaging.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this type of shades for every day use. The compact is gorgeous, love it.  The shades have good pigmentation, but it could be better especially on the lighter shades. Love that comes with matte and shimmer shades.  The shades do have fall out, especially ANGEL WINK shade, but once I apply setting spray is not as bad. These shades feel soft when applying, are really easy to blend and have buildable coverage, you can press onto lids with a flat brush if you want to achieve a more intense color. I really want to try the other palette, the colors look gorheous.  This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this pallette. The colors are beautiful. bright. pigmented, and most of all last for a very long time.  I am a makeup artist and I love the way the colors last all day.  buttery and gorgeous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty content creator, I was dying to try this new neutral palette from Gwen Stefani. Major girl crush on Gwen since Y2K - such an icon. If you want to make green/hazel eyes pop - this is it. The formula feels buttery when spreading on the lid and has very high pigment. A little will go a long way. I used the dark brown shade as a liner, the neutral brown as a base, and the glitter for some under-eye pop, and it lasted all day. The glitter shades sparkle and reflect light well - without being too over the top. If you want an everyday neutral eye that will pop, this is your palette. The compact is cute, making it perfect for carrying around in a bag, and it comes with a mirror for quick touch-ups. As we're heading into fall/winter, I'm excited to do smoky eye looks with this.   This review was collected as part of a promotion

What is simple to the point palette that is easy to use with great color payoff. I love the outer Packaging with very clean aesthetic that's reminiscent of Gwen Stefani's fashion brand L.A.M.B. this color palette is a beautiful way to add rosiness to my solo complexion and I even use some of the colors as blushes. Very easy to use and love the handwritten message on the mirror too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was incredibly excited to try the GXVE BY GWEN STEFANI Eye See in Color Clean Multidimensional Eyeshadow Palette in Simple Kind of Life. This palette gives a blend of neutral and vibrant shades, perfect for creating various looks. The packaging is sleek and stylish, not bulky and perfect for traveling.  The shades are arranged in a way that makes it easy to create both subtle and bold looks. This palette features a mix of matte and shimmer shades. All of them are incredibly versatile and can be used to create a natural everyday look or as a base for more dramatic eye makeup. The vibrant shades add a pop of color too. The formula is long-lasting,  crease-resistant and buttery, making it easy to apply and blend. They stay put throughout the day without fading or smudging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had the opportunity to try this product out & it did not disappoint. Personally I’m more into bold colors but I’ve been told a lot of times that because I have a baby face I should use more neutral/soft colors. I gave this a try and I liked it, it’s got different shades of pink and a few shades of brown/burgundy. I like the idea of not having a wide range of shades because it’s more of a on the go sort of palette, you have everything to make a single look. The colors are easy to blend and I like using my fingers to do so, the glitters are doing what they’re supposed to and the colors compliment them so well. There is also no fall out and I do think you get a decent amount of product for the price. The packaging looks very elegant, it’s easy to open and small to put on a small or big bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, this is a wonderful little eyeshadow palette. The size of it is perfect to take on the go and travel with, while still giving you 6 options of colors to choose from. The neutral colors are wonderful and very versatile. I think it makes a great smoky eye palette. I have been particularly blown away by the shimmer shades. They are stunning and incredibly pigmented. Just wow. I also love using the small black and brown pots for eyeliner. This way, I have a base color, glitter topper, and liner all in one small palette. I also didn’t notice any fallout while applying and good lasting power. I apply most of the shades with a brush, except for the glitter shades I apply with my finger tips. I do wish simple thing had a tiny bit more pigmentation (though it is intended as a lighter shade) but the other shades have great pigment. Overall, I would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying a GXVE product, and I have to say I am now a big fan. The quality, packaging, and results were outstanding. Gwen Stefani and her team have done a brilliant job with the makeup pallet 'Make Me Like You,' which is a tribute to her 2016 song. The pallet focuses on red/brown tones and shades. It features 2 darker red and brown shades (Soft Spot/Beau), 2 light pinkish shades (Day Dream/Darling), and 2 rose-gold glitter shades (Found You/LoveSick.) This versatile pallet allows for both glittery and neutral makeup looks to shine, which I love. I always like to incorporate glitter into my makeup looks, so I'm pleased that this pallet offers two everyday wearable glitter shades. Additionally, even the compact size of the pallet makes it perfect for on-the-go or travel. Overall, it's an amazing product with high-quality, blendable results, and being a collector's item designed by the one and only Gwen Stefani makes it even more special.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 31 yo, blue eyed, fair skinned, female who loves a good, easy to travel eyeshadow palette. This is a great size for travel or for just any other day of the week. I enjoyed the warmth and depth of the mattes in the palette, making an eye look kind of easy to pull off. The shimmers are beautiful, but I think they were too similar once swatched and on the eye lid. Overall I like the quality of the eye shadows, the color selection, and the pay off once worn. I wish they were a little longer lasting, but I did not use an eyeshadow primer when trying this out for longevity, so maybe I set it up for that. I will continue to use and recommend to family and friends. *This review was collected as part of a promotion*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I thoroughly enjoyed the overall color selection and performance of this specific palette. I feel as if it works super well for every day shades the formulation is really nice as well. You don’t get fallout the shadows and they blend very nicely together. I love that you can intensify the pigments With a little bit of water or Some setting spray to give it an extra pop. The packaging as well as super sturdy and I love that it has the mirror compact so it’s easy to throw in your make up bag and take it on the go. Overall, I feel this is a very solid palette for anybody that feels to be a beginner or just wants a neutral peachy eyeshadow palette

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty and makeup enthusiast, as well as someone that has truly enjoyed the few products I have already tried from GXVE beauty, I was excited to have the opportunity to try the Eye See In Color Multidimensional Eyeshadow Palette called Make Me Like You. It’s a beautiful palette that contains six warm toned eyeshadow shades, including four mattes and two shimmers. The component is lightweight and feels sturdy, making it perfect for taking on the go and when traveling. All six shades are very pigmented and can be built up nicely. I really enjoyed how quick and easy they were to build up and blend out. I wanted to note that I did notice quite a bit of kick back in the pan but that’s not something that bothers me. I didn’t experience any fall out and the shadows lasted all day without fading. This is definitely going to be one of my new go-to palettes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a Cosmetologist i am always looking for eyeshadows that are of great quality and will last me a while. Those a little bit goes a long way formulas. The eyeshadow colors are very pigmented and they blend beautifully on the eyes which is something thats very important. The eyeshadow colors are very beautiful as well. The eyeshadow palette comes with two beautiful shimmer shades and four matte eyeshadow colors that are beautiful as well! One of the larger matte shades can also be used as a blush it is a beautiful orange tone color that looks beautiful on the cheeks. The packaging is so so nice it is the classic GXVE packaging that i love! This is an overall beautiful little palette that I definitely recommend and it would also make a great travel palette!

reviews.review_title: Love that it’s made from clean ingredients!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The GXVE Eye See in Color Multidimensionak Eyeshadow Palette in “Make Me Like You” is gorgeous. The palette is marketed as good for people with warm undertones, and while the colors are certainly warm-toned, it looks great on people with cool undertones (like me!)  too. The matte brown shades (top right and bottom left) are great for everyday use. I’ll add one of the sparkly shades if I’m going out at night or just want to brighten my eye makeup. I have found that the bottom right shade is a little orange on my eyes but perfect as a blush, especially when using it with the rest of the palette on my eyes! Also, the packaging is so cute and I love that it has a mirror for on the go touch-ups. And the fact that it is made from clean ingredients is one of my favorite parts since I feel like that’s so rare for eyeshadows!  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this eyeshadow palette! It comes with a mixture of both mattes and shimmers. This is the perfect neutral palette that comes with these buttery and super blendable brown shades. I like that the shimmers look so pretty on the eyes and add the prettiest sparkle. You can go for a natural look or a more smoky and pigmented look. The packaging is perfect for traveling since it comes with a mirror and makes it so easy for on the go! I was very impressed with how well these blend out and how pigmented they are! I can’t wait to add this to my daily routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying the GXVE EYE SEE IN COLOR MAKE ME LIKE YOU eyeshadow palette. It has truly changed the way my eye makeup routine has gone from simple to multidimensional. With this approach for me to have beautiful colors for my everyday use. Especially on the days I have work appointments or just to add color. Not only is the design of the pallet unique. It has been designed by Gwen herself. How incredible is that. She makes me feel like I’m part of the process.     This exciting palette is  vegan, cruelty-free, plus gluten free. It’s highly pigmented, rich, buttery, pressed powder that’s full coverage and easily blended. The packaging is recyclable.   There are so many color combinations that I like to make with this palette from smokey cat eye to clean and classy. I’m in love with this look. I’m looking forward to trying more products from GXVE! I received this product as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The  colors in this palette are beautiful , I chose the warm palette “make me like “ , the  shimmers and mattes are both just beautiful. As a makeup artist I own many eyeshadows palettes and I'm trying to convince myself that I don't need any more palettes , but I'm not so sure that I can hold back from purchasing the cool tone palette.                                                                I  particularly love the shimmery golden warm colors , my options  for nighttime looks. Love the matte eyeshadows for the day. They both have great  pigment, I find the shimmery colors work better if you apply them with your fingers , for more payoff , I used the eye brush at first and the glitter got a little messy and ended up all over my eye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Right now using this beautiful palette. I love the colors, they are perfect to use for both day and night. I currently use it for work, I love how pigmented they are and I don't need touch-ups, right now it's my favorite and I love that it's perfect to carry in my purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a promotion. The eyeshadows blend really well and have great pigmentation. Its warmer than shown in the PR photos.

reviews.review_title: Good Longevity in a Well Balanced Palette
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As much as I love big colorful eyeshadow palettes, I always tend to grab my smaller palettes when I’m in a hurry. Part of that stems from my innate need to have someone else do the color matching for me. The GXVE Eye See in Color 6-pan palette in “Simple Kind of Life” offers a balanced trio of warm tones as well as three companion neutrals with a slightly cooler slant. I’m super picky about black mattes, and this one impressed me because it stayed put all day, didn’t fade, and was truly black with no greenish tone. I did use this palette with two different primers as well as a MAC paint pot cream shadow under it, and the longevity was consistent each and every time.  Because I am fair-skinned with cool undertones, I do prefer the left side of the palette (“Simple Thing,” “Return of Saturn,” and “Cat’s Meow”) but I was able to achieve a very pretty look using the warmer shades as well. The shimmers are sheer enough to be wearable even if you have mature lids, just exercise caution when applying them because they did “travel” into my eyelid crease on the instances when I layered them over a base shade of “Simple Thing.”  Closing Thoughts: This is an easy palette to use, and I plan to pack it in my travel bag for short trips because I can eliminate eyeliner by carrying this. All of the shades blend well with both natural hair and synthetic brushes, and the color payoff is admirable. As a side note, I know it’s not Gwen’s style, but I’d love to see a true cool-toned neutral palette with soft pink and eggshell in it because these shadows outlast my current favorites from Viseart. Just a thought.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging of this eye shadow product starting from the box it comes in. The aesthetics are super cute, checkered on the sides and gothic font. The palette packaging is a perfect size to travel or take with you but not so small that it feels like a mini. The colors are very rich and pigmented. You can create a cool tones or warm toned look. It’s very versatile allowing you to do a full glam look or just a light pinky natural look. The shadows are very soft and creamy making it blend effortlessly. The shadows stay on and do not crease after long wear. A huge bonus of this eyeshadow palette is that it’s cruelty free, clean ingredients, and made with recycled materials. This palette can also be refilled with replacement shadows when it becomes empty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging of this eye shadow product starting from the box it comes in. The aesthetics are super cute, checkered on the sides and gothic font. The palette packaging is a perfect size to travel or take with you but not so small that it feels like a mini. The colors are very rich and pigmented. You can create a cool tones or warm toned look. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who doesn't have a warm skintone I was a little intimidated by this warm palette. I have red hair, blue eyes and very fair/pale skin. I usually stick with neutral palettes! As soon as I tried this one though I fell in love! The matte shadows are so smooth and so perfectly formulated it was hard NOT to fall in love. They blend absolutely perfectly. There's no patchiness, no weirdness with ANY of these mattes. Zero fallout. The looks I was able to achieve were some of my favorites in a long time. That said and this is the reason I have taken off a star--the shimmer/glitters have so much fallout it's tragic. I applied them with my finger on a sticky primer and *still* my undereye was a glittery terrible mess that resisted every attempt to clean up. I will never attempt to use these shadows again but the quality of those mattes make buying this palette worth it. They are the best mattes I've every used. Plus I didn't try the trick of using a setting spray on my brush before applying them so that might work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got the GXVE eyeshadow palette in the shade Make me like you. It’s a good little palette for everyday makeup look and also to take traveling with you. The colors are warm and beautiful, I especially like the sparkly ones for a flirty look. The brown matte colors are super pigmented and make a great smoky eye for the evening.  The lighter shades are less pigmented and require an eyeshadow primer for easier application. Overall, I think this is a good palette with really cute packaging. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: stunning packaging for a beautiful pallette
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From the packaging, to the beautiful neutral shades, this palette is everything! I love the compact as it's sturdy, the perfect size for travel, and keeps the eyeshadows contained and safe inside. I love the versatility of the shades as I could create a neutral, everyday look with this palette, but also for a full glam or more serious moment. These eyeshades are extremely pigmented and I feel like the shimmer shades are such great quality! They don't have any fallout and lay gorgeously on the lid. I also really love how all the shades match and blend perfectly with eachother in that so many different looks can be created by just changing the base color! I've definitely been reaching for this palette recently as it has the perfect shades for summer/everyday look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try the GXVE Eye See in Color Eyeshadow Palette in Simple Kind of Life, and while the shades are gorgeous and versatile, there are a few issues that hold it back. The colors are richly pigmented and blend smoothly, allowing for a range of looks, from subtle to bold. However, I noticed that the eyeshadow has more powder fallout than I anticipated. It tends to settle under my eyes during application, which can be frustrating, especially when I'm in a hurry. Thankfully, it cleans up easily with a swipe of micellar water, but it does add an extra step to my routine. Overall, it’s a decent palette with beautiful colors, but the fallout is something to consider if you’re looking for a more seamless experience. Because of this I give it a 3 star rating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got to try out GXVE's Eye See in Color palette in the shade Make Me Like You. This palette has four shades in matte and shimmer finishes, all in a flattering peach and rose gold color scheme. The eye shadows are incredibly pigmented and blend like a dream. They're buttery smooth and apply evenly without any patchiness. The matte shades are true mattes, without any shimmer or glitter, while the shimmer shades are radiant and multidimensional. I love the versatility of this palette. You can create a variety of looks, from subtle everyday makeup to dramatic smoky eyes. The colors complement each other beautifully, making it easy to blend and transition between shades. Overall, I'm highly impressed with this eye shadow palette. The quality is excellent, the colors are stunning, and the formula is easy to work with. If you're looking for a versatile, high-performance eye shadow palette, I highly recommend giving this one a try.

reviews.review_title: I just found my new favorite!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a mom of two boys we are always on the go. Weather it be sports, school stuff, their friends houses or our own stuff I like quick and simple beauty stuff. Once I seen this I knew it was perfect for me. I really loved how it has the mirror inside as well. Not that many make ups have the mirror included still. I also loved the colors of these eye shadows.  Dark yet shiny, glittery yet not too glittery! I also liked how it went on so easy and stayed on for a long time! I applied early in the am when I was leaving my house and by 6 PM I noticed it was still there giving that shiny glitter look. These colors are great for casual day use or even a date night! I loved that I could make them look super classy or super simple and elegant.  I also liked the letter design on the outside. The style of the letters! This has been added to my makeup case I carry with me daily! It's become one of my favorites!!   This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think this palette is great for a natural look. The matte shades are super creamy and the glitters show up nicely. It’s a great one and done palette and can be used with others as well. I do wish that the glitters were in larger pans and am not sure if I’ll have much use for the lightest shade, but I enjoyed using this palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this beautiful pink, peachy, warm, and shimmery palette! It can be neutral or bold depending on your preferences for that day. The colors blend easily and are pretty pigmented at baseline yet still buildable. Love, love, love. The colors are so beautiful and they look amazing as eyeshadow colors for those who like warm tones.
