The packaging is also adorable and has a mirror attached to the top half of the palette. This comes in handy because it's the perfect size for a to-go palette. This is also much more versatile than the usual GXVE four color palette. Would very much recommend! This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have always been a fan of Gwen Stefani and I love her eye looks! This eye shadow palette is perfect to create that girly yet rocker look. I love how it is very travel friendly and the packaging is very lux and eye catching. Having both matte and shimmer shadows allows multi-dimensional looks for day and night. For example, you can go very light for during the day with the the two big matte shades with a light rose-gold shimmer in the center. Or you can go for a more smokey night look with the small two deeper shades and place it in the outer corners to give your eye look more depth. The formula does not give off to much fallout and the pigmentation is truly there. I love that it does last all throughout the day! Plus the packaging includes a mirror as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful packaging and beautiful shade range. Application is super easy and also super easy to blend. I love the colors and I love the glittery shadows because I can use them for a night out and the lighter shades are perfect for the day. Honestly this is the best kit to travel with because it gives you day and night options. I definitely need to try more options from this range and will probably be trying the darker shades now. I love love love how this looks. It’s also Really pretty packaging that looks great on your vanity and something you can just pick up. The best part is that if you don’t have a brush and are in a rush you can quickly go and apply with your fingers because of how smooth the shadow is. I will definitely be recommending this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're looking for a palette that checks all the boxes, this is it! This little palette packs a punch! The mix of matte and shimmer shades in peach and rose gold is stunning and versatile, allowing me to create anything from a subtle daytime look to a bold evening glam. Shadows are very flattering on my light olive skin. They’re pigmented but blendable, making it easy to build up or keep things soft and simple. The pigmentation is just right—buildable, blendable, and never patchy, with no fallout, so I don’t have to worry about a mess on my cheeks. Plus, the formula feels silky smooth on my lids and stays put throughout the day without creasing.The colors blend effortlessly, making it a breeze to use whether you're a makeup newbie or a pro. I love how this compact palette fits easily in my bag, making it perfect for on-the-go touch-ups or travel. Definitely a must-have in my collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this palette even more than I was expecting! The colors are beautiful, both in the palette and as an eye shadow. I love that the more neutral and day-to-day colors have larger pans than the bold and shimmer colors. There is also a mirror on the upper half of the palette which is super useful. The products blend wonderfully and are pigmented, but still buildable. This is my new day to day product due to the color combinations, easy application, and durability. My favorite color is the light pink one and I use the other colors to blend out the corners. Would recommend this palette to anyone wanting a warm, peachy, and pink eyeshadow combo. I love having six different colors in this palette. It allows for many combinations, but also some simplicity (not overwhelmed with too many choices). This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a beauty enthusiast and when it comes to makeup, I usually go for warm soft colors because my skin is fair and neutral with warm undertones. Smokey eyes are usually too harsh on me, but I love to make my green eyes pop sometimes. So, I was super excited to be given the opportunity to try the GXVE Eye See In Color Multi-dimensional eyeshadow palette. I have the Simple Kind of Life matte and shimmer which is a neutral palette. This compact has everything you need for day-to-night looks. The packaging was nothing to be impressed by, but the product inside made up for it. I thought the colors were easy to blend and layer over one another. First, I put on the lightest color of shadow called Simple Thing. Then on the outside third of my eyelids, I blended the medium beige shadow called Settle Down over top. Next, I took the chestnut brown shadow called 2000 and blended it in from the innermost corner of my eye to the middle of my eyelids. With a small fluffy brush, I lightly dusted over the glitter shadow for a little added shimmer. Lastly, and the part I was most excited about was using my angled brush to line the top and bottom of my eyelids with the black eyeshadow. I was absolutely in awe of how easy it was to press into my eye lead as a liner. Rather than using an eye pencil that pulls on the skin, this black eyeshadow was so easy to press in with my angled brush! The powder stayed perfectly in place with absolutely zero residue or dust on the rest of my eyelid. To finish, I whisked on my favorite mascara. The finished look was a subtle smoky eye, which looked so lovely against my fair skin. If you have cooler undertones and can rock a more intense smokey eye, I believe this is the only palette you need! It layers and blends well together, and you won’t need anything else besides mascara. A few hours later I noticed that everything was still in place and there was no need for a touch-up. I give this product, four stars for versatility and ease of application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is such a beautiful transition palette from fall to winter. I love that it is made with clean ingredients. I have sensitive skin and can break out around my eye lids. This product didn't irritate my skin or break me out. All the different colors are so fun to play with. They look beautiful on my fair skin that has warm tones. The peach is such an on trend color this year and this is the perfect darker peach to transition into fall and winter colors that I will be wearing. It also really pops with my brown eyes. They shimmer colors are great for highlighting and the glitter doesn't transfer from the lid. It's a nice shimmer for someone more mature who wants a little sparkle. The eyeshadow was long lasting and easy to build and create many different looks. It looks beautiful with a black or brown eyeliner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These shadows have a stunning combination of matte warm colors and two shimmery golden shades that are perfect for any makeup look. The matte colors are rich and smooth, providing great foundation and depth to the look, while the shimmery shades add the perfect amount of sparkle and dimension. The combination of these colors makes it easy to create both everyday looks and more glamorous styles for special occasions. The pigmentation is impressive and they blend easily, providing a smooth transition from one shade to the next. For my green eyes, this is a versatile and quality palette that is sure to become a staple in my makeup collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for a long time for a palette of neutral-warm colors to create different looks that work for me to go well-groomed to the office without using too much makeup. Thanks to this palette of shadows I can create beautiful and natural looks that are long-lasting to be perfectly presentable all day. I am delighted with this palette since it is easy to create natural and elegant looks because it has a variety of colors, all of them pigmented very well. My eyelids are oily and the shadows adhere perfectly without becoming patchy or moving over time. The application is perfect since the shadows blend very well, do not stain, do not cause creases and are not powdery. It adheres very well to the eyelid, in my case it has lasted up to 8 hours and I have not needed to touch up. When removing the shadows it is also very easy since a single cotton pad with makeup remover is enough to remove the product without leaving stains and does not require friction to do so. The packaging is beautiful, and it has a mirror that is very convenient to carry anywhere. I am very happy with this product and I plan to buy the other colored shadows as well because I loved the formula as it is soft, creamy and very long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a big fan of Gwen’s makeup like for quite some time and I am not disappointed with this palette. Firstly, I really appreciate the design of the packaging and its color choice, edgy yet elegant! Palette itself has such a pretty colors, I just adore the neutral shades with the pop of shimmer. This palette is so versatile, you can definitely create some beautiful day looks and edgy night time in no time. Texture of the eyeshadows is soft , and easy to work with. Colors blend well together and I have not experienced any fallout. With use of primer eyeshadows last on my oily skin even all day. Overall I have been really enjoying Simple Kind Of Life palette, definitely recommend it as the go to neutral palette, not only when home , but also when traveling. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: Extraordinary and creative way an everyday makeup

I really loved that the product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty free to protect the eye from any harmful chemicals. Overall my favorite thing about the GXVE by Gwen Stefani Eye See In Color Clean Multidimensional Eyeshadow Palette is that I was able to apply it and blend it however much I like and it gave me a full coverage for any occasion and this palette is perfect for being creative and allowing you to create different everyday makeup routines.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I wish that the shimmer shades were larger since I will definitely run out! Overall, it's a really fun palette to have for on the go or for a more glam look. I will continue using until I run out, and explore more from GXVE. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a standout choice.  The GXVE eyeshadow palette offers a stunning mix of matte, shimmer, and satin finishes that cater to every occasion, from everyday wear to bold, evening looks.  Pigment: The pigment payoff is impressive, delivering vibrant, true-to-pan color with minimal fallout. reviews.review_shade_purchased: Make Me Like You - matte & shimmer peach & rose gold

These eyeshadows have excellent staying power, lasting throughout the day without significant fading or creasing, even on oily lids.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gwen Stefani GXVE “Make Me Like You” eye palette is filled with stunning shades of pink that are perfect for creating everything from soft, romantic looks to bold, statement eyes. The pigment is rich and buttery, making it easy to blend and build up color for any occasion.  Her products wear beautifully and are safe and gentle on the eyes. The palette’s packaging is as chic as you’d expect from Gwen, and the shades range from delicate rosy hues to vibrant pinks that really pop. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am somebody that is constantly trying the newest trends of makeup! I love sharing my honest opinions. Now, I love all shades of eyeshadow but I definitely am more of a non-dramatic girly. The ‘’make me like you” palette is the shade I have been using. This Gxve palette has beautiful sparkly and pinkish/skin tone shades. It contains exactly the colors that I use in my everyday life so I was psyched to give it a shot.  The consistency is very spreadable and easy to apply to my eyelids and eye areas. I applied it before work and it stayed in place until after work. I do not use any sprays to keep it in place, either. The colors really ‘pop’ and brought out the color in my eyes. The sparkles give it a pretty princess effect.  The packaging is very cute and aesthetically pleasing! It has a built in mirror for your convenience which is nice. It is slim in size and easy to fit in your purse for on the go use.

reviews.review_title: More flattering on some than others
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m grateful to have been sent this Gxve Eye See in Color Eyeshadow Palette in the “Make Me Like You” variation for free in exchange for my review. I’m a makeup lover and I’ve been mainly focusing my passion on eyeshadow palettes. I know what finishes and shades I prefer, but more importantly what suits my skin tone and other features. A palette could have great longevity and blendability and be unwearable for me because of the way the shades show up on my skin tone. Unfortunately, “Make Me Like You” is one of those palettes. I think the other variation, “Simple Kind of Life“, would have been much better for my complexion and I would have really liked it, especially because of its other positive qualities, but the warmer shades in “Make Me Like You” clash with my skin tone and look quite unattractive on me. If your skin has very cool undertones like mine, this palette might be unflattering on you too. I think it blended well and that the shadows had great longevity. The pigmentation was great too, and I'm sure some people will really love this palette. It just didn't suit me well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A beautiful eyeshadow palette that is clean makeup!! I love that the palette includes a mix of matte and shimmer finishes so I don’t have to find other palettes to complete the look. It also comes with a mirror which makes it very easy to travel with and use. The shades are very blendable and buildable- you can do every day look with these shadows but you can also do a night time glam smokey eye with it. Over all, its a great palette to travel on vacation with and the price point is great for the quality!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have many nude palettes from different brands, but heard a lot about GXVE palettes, so was happy to try this one. First thing that I want to mention is the packaging. I always love simple, but elegant designs, because I believe that such designs show the true kind of luxury and beauty. The case is so wonderful with this quite large mirror. The shades of this shadow pallet make me even more crazy. It’s the best balance of light and dark colors, shimmering and matte shades. Matte shades blend in skin perfectly, so I can create from slightly visible to really bright eye make-up. Shimmers sparkle so bright and can be easily used as a highlighter as well. All shades are very pigmented, and I showed this fact in the video.  Now it’s my favorite shadow pallet, which I often put in my purse, to make my eyes, when I don’t have enough time to do it at home. Totally recommend this little cute, but highly useful thing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've always loved Gwen Stefani, so I was very excited to finally try some of her makeup. I love creating different eye looks, from bold and colorful, to more simple and subtle. This palette contains a nice collection of neutral colors that can easily take you from the office to date night. I appreciate that it contains both matte and shimmer finishes. I've easily been able to create a variety of looks only using this palette. The colors are very pigmented and I absolutely love the shimmers. They apply very smoothly with a luxurious, buttery texture. I haven't experienced any fallout, and they blend very nicely. They wear very well throughout the day without any creasing or having to reapply. The palette itself is very cute and well made. I especially love the generous sized mirror. I truly love everything about this eyeshadow palette!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the  Make Me Like You shade. I noticed some changes compared to the original pictures. This new palette comes with six shades now. I noticed an unpleasant scent coming from the palette as soon as I opened it. I'm not sure if this is a common issue or if I just received a bad batch. The eyeshadows themselves feel incredibly soft and smooth, which makes them easy to blend. The downside is that the formula is powdery and see through. The shadows just weren’t very pigmented. As someone with brown skin, I found that only three out of the six shades were visible on my skin tone. This lack of pigmentation might be disappointing for those looking for bold or vibrant colors, but it could be a plus if you prefer a more natural, subtle look. I had to use a lot and be VERY heavy handed to get it to look like other eyeshadows. I would say that this palette is best suited for an every day, office type of makeup look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow palette has very nice packaging and the mirror comes in handy especially when I'm out and about. The palette has a nice selection of shadows and the darker colors are really pigmented. Unfortunately most of the colors don't look nice on my skin tone. I wasn't happy with the way my eyeshadow look came out, it made me look washed out. The black shadow is great to use as an eyeliner which is what I plan to do from now on, it didn't smudge. The shimmer shades had a good amount of fallout and I personally won't be using them again. I had to use a lot of the shimmer just for it to be noticeable as well. It's the perfect size for traveling and keeping in your purse for touch ups. Overall it's a nice palette it just isn't suitable for me and my skin tone. This review was collected as part of a promotion

There was quite a a bit of fall out from the palette it was not very easy to add to my hand where I first looked at the swatches of the colors. Alot of extra powder was everywhere when I swatched the palette. So when I tried it on my eyes I probably should have used a primer because the same thing happened there as well. I got some of the eyeshadow in my eye as well. The colors were very pretty, but I wished I had received the other one, I think that one had run out. So I got this one instead. I was pleased with the compact part of the palette and the colors, but the fallout was hard to deal with I will not be purchasing this palette in the future, this does not stop my interest in Gwen, this palette was just not for me!

There are two shimmer shades: a gold and a pink. The colors can take you from an office casual daytime look to a smoky, sultry evening look with just the addition of one of the deeper shades. The palette blends beautifully and stays put without creasing for hours. I received this as part of a promotion.

It's not too overpowering but yet noticeable and natural. This product is definitely a must have. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_text: The **GXVE BY GWEN STEFANI Eye See in Color Clean Multidimensional Eyeshadow Palette** in the **Make Me Like You** shade is a product that many makeup enthusiasts were eager to try, especially given Gwen Stefani's reputation for bold, vibrant makeup looks. The palette itself is visually stunning, with a sleek design that feels both modern and luxurious. The color story of the Make Me Like You shade is versatile, featuring a mix of shimmery and matte tones that should theoretically allow for a wide range of eye looks, from subtle daytime glamour to more dramatic evening styles.  However, while the palette promises multidimensional color and high-impact pigmentation, the actual performance can be a bit underwhelming, particularly regarding the pigment payoff. The shades, while beautiful in the pan, don’t translate with the same intensity when applied to the eyelid. You might find that you need to layer the shadows multiple times to achieve the desired vibrancy, which can be disappointing, especially for those expecting more from a brand associated with a pop icon known for her bold style.  That being said, the shadows blend nicely and have a smooth texture, making them easy to work with. The formulation is clean and free from many common irritants, which is a plus for those with sensitive skin. The shimmery shades, in particular, do offer a lovely sheen that catches the light beautifully, but the overall impact is softer than some might prefer.  In conclusion, the GXVE Eye See in Color Palette in Make Me Like You has its strengths in terms of blendability and aesthetic appeal, but it falls short in delivering the high pigmentation that some users might expect. If you're looking for a palette that offers a softer, more buildable approach to color, this could be a good fit. However, if you’re after intense, one-swipe color payoff, this palette might leave you wanting more.   This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: Hard no for these dry and muddy eyeshadows
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've provided two photos of swatches in this review. First photo is finger swatched on bare skin, second photo is swatched with a brush over primer.  Unfortunately, I knew when I swatched this palette that I was not going to like these eyeshadows at all. The first negative for me is that the formula is very dry. I have dry skin as it is, but immediately upon swatching, my skin felt TERRIBLY dry. I was afraid to put this product on my eyelids because of how it made my hand feel, but for the sake of review I took one for the team and did it anyway. The same thing happened on the eyes, of course. It sucks all the moisture out of your skin. I have never experienced this with another product as badly as I did with this.  Another major issue with this palette is that the darkest color is extremely patchy. You can see that in the swatches. All of the matte shades in this palette blend poorly and appear muddy. The two shimmery shades fortunately do not look muddy and blend better than the mattes do, but they are still not good at all.  I also find that these shadows are not the easiest to remove, perhaps because of how dry they are on the skin. My typical makeup removal consists of micellar water followed up by a good cleanser. I had to use extra micellar water and an oil based remover to get this off entirely. I have no idea how these last through the day because I had to immediately remove the eyeshadow because of how dry it is.   Overall, I do not like this palette at all and do not recommend it. I cannot find anything positive to say. If you have oily eyelids and have issues with shadows staying on your lids, you might appreciate the dry formula... maybe? Even if you did appreciate the feeling, these still blend out muddy looking. Don't waste your money on this. You can buy drugstore eyeshadows that absolutely blow these out of the water.

Each shade is carefully curated to offer a multidimensional and versatile range of colors for creating various eye makeup looks.  Day Dream is a soft and dreamy shade, perfect for creating subtle and natural looks. Found You is a deeper and more mysterious hue, ideal for adding depth and drama to the eyes. Beau offers a sophisticated and elegant touch with its rich and luxurious tone. Soft Spot is a gentle and delicate color, suitable for blending and softening other shades. Lovesick is a romantic and passionate hue, adding a pop of color and vibrancy to my eyes. Lastly, Darling is a sweet and charming shade, perfect for highlighting and accentuating my eyes.  The GXVE Eye See In Color palette offers a well-rounded selection of shades that can be easily mixed and matched to create a variety of eye makeup looks, from everyday natural styles to bold and dramatic creations. The palette's multidimensional formula provides a smooth and blendable application, allowing for seamless transitions between colors and effortless layering for customized intensity.  Overall, the Eye See In Color palette by GXVE is a versatile and high-quality eye shadow palette that caters to a wide range of preferences and styles. reviews.review_text: As a 56-year-old woman who loves experimenting with eye makeup, I’ve tried many eyeshadow palettes. Still, the GXVE 'Eye See In Color' multi-dimensional eyeshadow palette in “Make Me Like You” truly stands out. This palette has become a go-to in my collection for its exceptional versatility and quality. With six beautifully curated shades, it offers a perfect blend of matte and shimmer finishes, making it easy to switch up my look from day to night or from subtle to bold.  What I really appreciate about this palette is the pigmentation. The colors are vibrant, giving full coverage with minimal product. The buttery texture of the shadows ensures they blend effortlessly, allowing me to easily create professional-looking results. Even after years of experimenting with different products, I’m impressed by how these shadows layer and blend to add depth and dimension without any fallout. It’s ideal whether you’re just starting with makeup or have been playing with it for decades like I have.  Another highlight is longevity. Even without an eyeshadow primer, these shades stay vibrant and crease-free for hours, making them perfect for long days or nights. I love that I don’t need to worry about touch-ups, even when I’m out and about.  The palette itself is sleek and compact, which is great for travel or for keeping in my purse for quick touch-ups. Despite its portable size, there’s a generous amount of product, so it’s a palette that lasts.  While it’s priced higher than some drugstore options, the investment is worth it. The combination of richly pigmented, long-lasting shades and overall versatility makes this palette a must-have for anyone who enjoys playing with different looks. If you’re looking for a high-quality, multifunctional eyeshadow palette, the GXVE 'Eye See In Color' in “Make Me Like You” is an excellent choice, especially if, like me, you love experimenting with your eye makeup at any age. I think the colors are well paired, and versatile this can work with a range of skin colors and age groups. I have nothing bad to say on this palette. It honestly checked every one of my boxes. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GXVE by Gwen Stefani Make Me Like You Palette has six gorgeous colors. There are  two large shades and four smaller pans.  The colors range from a cream base to warm berry browns and to pink and gold shimmers.  I also love the names of the eyeshadows as well - Day Dream , Found You, Beau , Soft Spot, Lovesick, and Darling. I’m a huge fan of her Music as well and these names remind me of her songs. You can easily create a subtle daytime look to a gorgeous evening out on the town look.  The colors blend beautifully and last all day.  The packaging is sleek, lightweight, and perfect for travel or keeping in your purse. It also has a beautiful mirror so that’s one less thing you need to take with you.   It’s made in Italy. It’s vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and the packaging is recyclable. So, it’s both glam and green.   This palette is perfect if you want something versatile and luxurious that delivers on quality. It’s quickly becoming my go-to, and I can’t recommend it enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This ultra-compact palette features six universally flattering shades that suit all skin tones, effortlessly transitioning your look from day to night.  Simple Thing and Settle Down are my least favorite shades—both are flat mattes with a somewhat powdery texture, prone to fallout and clumping. While they make for decent base shades, there's nothing particularly noteworthy about them.  Return of Saturn and Angel Wink are the standouts for me, offering multidimensional shimmer with easy application and no fallout. The creamy texture and vibrant shimmers deliver an impactful look that transitions seamlessly from day to night. These shades work best when applied with your fingers, as the warmth of your skin transforms the formula into a liquid gold-like finish.  Cat's Meow deserves special mention—this shade is an intensely pigmented, void-like black. It's the darkest black eyeshadow I've ever swatched, with zero fallout. It creates a dramatic, smoky effect and doubles as the perfect black eyeliner. Just use a tiny liner brush, and you'll see magic happen.  2000 embodies the early millennium vibe with its supermodel bronzy brown shade. While it doesn’t particularly excite me, it's still a highly wearable and versatile color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a busy mom of 2 teens & makeup addict, I am always looking for eye makeup that stays in place all day long without having to reapply throughout the day. I am not a professional by any means, but love exploring different styles and trends and creating simple, yet eye-catching looks. This palette, MAKE ME LIKE YOU, is perfect for creating everyday looks, or going for a night out on the town.  It has two shimmer shades, Love Sick & Found You, and these 2 shades are the reason I am giving it 4 stars. They are gorgeous shades, but they are way too identical in color once you see them in person. They both look like they are rose gold shades, rather than one of them being a peach shade. The stock pictures make them look like two totally different colors, and are the entire reason I wanted to try this palette. I was a little disappointed in that part, but that's the only negative thing I'd say about this. It does stay on all day long & does not crease, which is all I've been looking for in a good eye palette. The packaging is so chic, but also fits the Gwen Stefani brand perfectly. All in all, if they would revamp this palette and actually make the 2 shimmer colors look like they do in the stock pictures, I would give it 10 stars. But I would still recommend it because it does everything you would want in a good eyeshadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been enjoying using this eyeshadow palette. The colors create the perfect everyday eyeshadow look. I find the formula to be very easy to work with. The colors are smooth and seem to be quite pigmented. I love that I can create natural looks and full on night out looks with this palette. I love the shimmer shades for adding a pop. These colors seem to wear really nice throughout the day, but I do notice that my eyes need to be prepped really well or it creases by the end of the day. It isn't horrible, but definitely something to considered when planning to purchase this. Overall, I am extremely pleased with this eyeshadow palette. It is definitely beginner friendly and pro friendly. The shades are easy to work with and give endless possibilities to create looks!

reviews.review_title: Good palette but colors don’t last
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Gwen Stefani GXVE Simple Kind of Life Eyeshadow Palette has its strengths, but it’s not without flaws. The color selection is beautiful, offering a mix of neutral and bold shades that are perfect for everyday wear or a pop of glam. The packaging is sleek and travel-friendly, which is a nice touch. However, the formula could be better. Some of the shades, especially the mattes, are a bit chalky and require extra effort to blend smoothly. The pigmentation varies, with some shades delivering vibrant color payoff while others need a few layers to show up. It’s a decent palette for Gwen Stefani fans or those looking for a versatile, on-the-go option, but it may not fully satisfy those who prioritize consistently high-quality pigmentation and blendability. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: Lots of potential but room for improvement
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Extremely powdery with lots of kickback from the mattes and fallout from the glitters (and they are absolutely glitters, not shimmers). If you've ever used Tarte's eyeshadow, it's a similar level of powder kickback. Literally one swatch per pan and the black plastic of the palette was already pretty covered in eyeshadow powder.  The color story is pretty good and offers some nice options for different eye looks, although I would have liked to have a lighter, more neutral brown instead of the medium red as a large pan, like a more tan version of the pale pink to use as an alternative base color. Or even a lighter shimmer or sparkly to use as an inner corner highlight. I wouldn't say it's incomplete, but I think a slight tweak like that would make it a little better for getting more variety in looks. The lightest shade (top left pan) is a great base color for me, and both browns work well for crease or corner application, in terms of depth. The glitters have very little base color on their own, and have a lot of fallout. They honestly look better in person than in pictures because they are very sparkly and eye-catching, but it's hard to capture without movement.   The performance isn't terrible but isn't great. Primer makes a huge difference, and glitter glue even more so for the glitters. I've never considered myself to have particularly dry eyelids, but trying to apply these without primer they somehow found dry patches to cling to. They definitely need prep work to look their best. I tried a couple quick looks with no primer (sorry for no eyeliner and lashes to finish!) and thought they blended pretty well though, just had lots of fallout and were a bit more muted. Probably not a good pick for someone who likes to be one (or two) shades and done. I even tried the large pans as blushes just to see, but I wouldn't recommend it. They both pulled much more orange-y and kind of dusty looking over a large area like that.  The packaging is cheap looking and hard to open.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast who loves makeup, I was so excited to try the new Clean Multidimensional Eyeshadow Palette in Make Me Like You. Make Me Like You is gorgeous warm colors, which is perfect for fall. I usually only use neutral colors while doing my makeup, so I enjoyed the opportunity to branch out. Each palette is color curated to easily create complete eye looks in just one palette- from everyday nude to amped up smoky. I loved that the eyeshadow palette is blendable, creamy, and has no-crease formula that gives ultra-rich color. It is easy to use, and can be applied with fingers or brushes- meaning it is perfect for beginners! It is clean, vegan, gluten-free and cruelty-free. I recommend this eyeshadow palette to everyone, as it’s great for every skin tone type. The only downfall to this palette is just the glitter shadows- they just weren’t pigmented enough and didn’t show up great on my eye lids.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a makeup artist, I love trying new brands… and this is the first product from GXVE that I have tried. I really liked it! The eyeshadow packaging is gorgeous and really clean looking. It is a nice blend of cool and warm tones, dark and light colors and matte and shimmers- which makes it so versitile. It has everything you need in one palette- lid color, highlight and accent color.  The shadow applied very smoothly and not dusty at all. It didn’t have much fall off either. It seemed to last all day without much fading. I used it with and without an eyeshadow primer, and I would have to say I think it looked better and lasted longer with the primer. I do wish the shimmer shadows were a little larger.  Overall, this is a great palette for someone looking for one item that has everything in one place. It would be a great palette for on the go- vacation or a gym bag

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE how easy it is to blend and so pigmented! They colors are my favorite they go with an everyday look! Of course not the black but I love how Blend able it is that you can work with a Smokey eye so good with it! It’s a great product!!  I highly recommend these eyeshadows! My first time ever trying this brand and I must say it’s a great brand. If your looking for a new eyeshadow brand or just an eyeshadow palette that is easy to work with.. THIS ONES IT!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved skin care and fragrance since I was young. It only made sense that I became an aesthetician. My passion for skin care overflowed into make up as well as supplemental. I have worked for high end makeup companies as a makeup artist as well as at skincare spas. Currently I work for a naturopath doctor and we help people heal from the inside out. I perform numerous treatments to help slow the aging process. I couldn't love what I do any more and only wish to help more people through my knowledge and training of skin and makeup practices as well as my education on nutritional supplements. I am 36 with three kids and the signs of aging are creeping up faster than I would like! I love to try things to combat that while staying out of a doctor’s office.  From the moment I opened the package, it was gorgeous and made me feel like Gwen! I love that these eye shadows don’t have any perfume in them. The look stunning in their case but even better on your skin. They go on like butter and have great pigmentation. The glitter does fall so be sure to wear a primer if you use those colors. The flat colors stay put all day even through 100 degrees and sweat! I highly recommend this palette for ages 10 and up! It is very gentle and nonirritating. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this palette so much! Each shade is thoughtfully curated, making it effortless to create a complete eye look, whether I’m aiming for a subtle nude or a more dramatic smoky eye. The blendable, creamy textures are a dream to work with—there’s no need to worry about creasing or fading throughout the day. Even on days when I’m rushing, I can apply the shadows with my fingers for a quick, polished look. What truly stands out about this palette is the ultra-rich color payoff. The buttery, multidimensional finishes add just the right amount of depth and shimmer to my eyes, making them pop without being overpowering. And as someone who prefers clean beauty, I appreciate that this product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free. Versatility is another major plus. This palette is perfect for everyday wear, but it also transitions seamlessly into evening looks when I want to feel a bit more glamorous.  Overall, this palette has become my go-to, not just for its stunning colors and finishes, but for the ease and confidence it brings to my makeup routine. It’s beyond versatile and truly lives up to its name.

reviews.review_title: A Lovely Palette For The Right Skin Tone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I an a beauty enthusiast and recently received the Simple Kind of Life eyeshadow palette. Let’s begin with the mattes; they are neutral, soft and buttery with a little kickback (a little is good; it means you and your brushes aren’t going to fight with hard pan - a, well, hard film over the powder that makes it difficult to pick up product. Too much kickback is not good, as it’s more likely the product, whether powder eyeshadow, blush, bronzer, etc., will crumble). The mattes applied nicely with and without primer.   I found the liner shadows difficult to use without wetting my brush first. I used several different brushes to be certain and had the same result each time. The brushes weren’t able to pick up enough product to give more than a shadow otherwise, and I don’t have time to build up liner. There are far easier products and applications otherwise.  The foiled lid toppers were picked up nicely on a dry brush. They look as though they would be more foiled, but that isn’t the case and it’s fine.  The packaging is plastic and sturdy enough. One thing I was thrilled to find is it doesn’t contain any of those useless little brushes that even luxury brands still insist on including for some reason. They waste space, plastic, and end up in the bin the moment I see them. GXVE is wise enough to understand this. It may seem like a small thing, but you don’t have to test makeup and have hundreds of palettes to find it wasteful and irritating.  Personally, these shades, though neutral, did not work for me. I have light-medium skin tone with pink undertone. She shades made the rest of my face look sallow. I do plan to test the other Eye See In Color palette, though. I believe I’ll have better results.              kickback (a little

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The GXVE Simple Kind of Life eyeshadow palette is a great product! I use it everyday for any occasion! I love the mixture of neutral matte and shimmer eyeshadow colors! The texture is great, it glides on smooth and blends very well! There's very little if any fallout and it looks great all day. This palette can be used for a natural or bold look. I recommend this eyeshadow palette to anyone that loves neutral matte colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Eye See in Color palette is a great two look palette for daytime and nighttime. The mattes are pigmented enough to be effective and the shimmers are very shimmery. The lightest shade in the Simple Kind of Life palette is a bit light for me and basically is invisible, and the black color is not super strong which can be useful for beginners so they don’t apply too much. Overall it feels like a great starter palette for cool toned skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Simple Kind of Life by GXVE has beautiful matte and glittery shades, making it the perfect eyeshadow palette for creating a smokey and sultry eyeshadow look. I would recommend this eyeshadow palette for all makeup lovers and even beginners because of how convenient and easy it is to use. The eyeshadows are buttery, opaque, and easily blendable and buildable.  **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of using the GXVE Eye See in Color Eyeshadow Palette: Make Me Like Yo, and I have to say it has truly transformed my makeup routine. As someone who loves experimenting with colors and textures, this palette has become an essential part of my beauty collection.  Firstly, the packaging is absolutely stunning. The sleek design and vibrant colors immediately caught my eye, and it feels luxe yet accessible. When I open it up, I'm greeted with a beautiful array of shades that are not only diverse but also incredibly versatile. The selection ranges from soft neutrals to bold pops of color, allowing me to create everything from everyday looks to adventurous nighttime glam.  This review was collected as part of a promotion

This GXVE simple kind of life eye palette is so beautiful. My working environment doesn’t allow me to have too bold makeup and this one is very suitable for everyday natural looking. Of course it is also very easy to build up layers for bold looks. All the colors are very neutral and brown except the black one which I use it as an eyeliner. The light matte colors are great for base and have a nice coverage and the deeper matte color is used to create the depth and sculpture of eyes. The glittering colors are very fine and once applied they don’t smudge or transfer. All the colors are very pigmented and if you want a natural look like me you only need one or two applications. It doesn’t come with any applicators but the size of the mirror is very decent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Comes in a very lightweight plastic container with the lid closed very securely. This makes it perfect for carrying in my purse.  I like that it doesn’t have any scent and it comes with a mirror, which is always great. Also, it doesn’t irritate my sensitive eyes.   When I opened it I was impressed with the array of gorgeous colors. Very easy to mix and match depending on mood and outfit. People with fair/light skin will benefit the most out of it, but it will work for almost anyone if you like the color scheme. With it being such natural colors, I would not say it is very buildable because you cannot quite get the level of contrast many people like. Not extremely pigmented and I feel like the mattes can be patchy but the looks still turn out fine when I put a shimmer on top.    I have tried to play with it several ways, but all the shades looked very similar on my skin and I haven’t achieved a full look I was hoping for. Eventually I figured out the best way for me to use it is as a base eye shade and to use it with other palettes to get a finished look. Also, the best way to use the shimmer shades is to push it with a finger into your skin for it to stay. The formula is a bit dry and powdery, so expect some fallout. I use an eye primer first and it increases staying power.    It is an average product and I would suggest it.  * This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a makeup artist I am very impressed with this palette from Gxve beauty. I was given this palette for free in exchange for my honest opinion. The Make Me like you palette is a very flattering set of colors that can give you a variety of looks to create. It has everything you need to complete a look with a; base color, shimmer shade, crease color and outer shadow. All of the colors are nicely pigmented and blend easily on lid. I had no fall out from the colors and they were easy to blend together. I was able to take a day to look to a night look easily and quick. They feel very soft as I blend them on my lids and the result is so nice. This will be the perfect palette for me going into the fall and winter months. This is a palette that I would highly recommend to both beauty clients and friends as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The GXVE Eye See in Color palette is one of those products that catches your eye immediately. The packaging makes the product look super elegant and luxurious. The immediate vibe it gives out after opening is experimentation. The color story of the palette is truly amazing. With the color options in the palette you can really create multiple different looks, from a full glam to a day wear office look. The palette has a good mix of shimmers too to add the glam touches to your look. I have been incredibly in love with this palette and would be travelling with this wherever I go. The best part that I personally like about the palette is that it has a black shade. With black being it in it gives me the perfect eyeliner look on the go without any touchup needed plus can create smokey eye from the same palette which is a win win for me. Lastly, the pigmentation is very impressive too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GXVE Eye See in Color Eyeshadow Palette: Make Me Like You is a very beautiful palette with different shades of matte colors in shimmery peach and rose gold. The colors are very rich, highly pigmented, buildable,  leaves no creases, and very creamy to the touch as if they are moisturing. I love that this palette is versatile. You can achieve a soft daytime look and since it's buildable you can also go for a more dramatic night time look with this palette.  I love clean beauty and this palette is cruelty-free and vegan. Overall, this a  beautiful creamy eyeshadow palette that has multidimensional use and its refillable.             This review was collected as part of a promotion

As a makeup artist and skincare specialist, I always look forward to trying new products in the world of beauty. I was recently given the opportunity to try an eyeshadow palette-Make Me Like You. This beauty product is GXVE by Gwen Stefani. When I opened the box, you can't help by notice the beautiful packaging. This eyeshadow palette comes in such a stylish case with 6 eyeshadows.  The presentation of colors is very rich. Having brown eyes I felt that the combination of colors would work well. I started using this palette and amazed at how the shadows have such a rich pigment.  The formulation makes is so easy for the shadow to glide on. These shadows are bendable and creamy.  I absolutely love how you can create a day look and easily go into an evening look. The colors really compliment each other. This is a definite must-have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time using an eyeshadow from GXVE. I received the multidimensional eyeshadow palette in the color Simple Kind of Life. This is a gorgeous array of 6 colors, consisting of 4 flat and 2 with shimmer. The compact is made mostly of plastic and it's nice and sturdy with a mirror included. The name of the palette, Simple Kind of Life, is the perfect way to describe these natural beauties. I'm all about the nudes, earth tones, black, and gold. The eyeshadow is very pigmented so it looks exactly like what's in the palette. It applies easily, is very blendable and has very little fallout. It definitely lasts throughout an entire day and is easy to wash off. I'm 100% impressed with this palette. It goes well with my olive skin, brown eyes, and brown hair. In fact, if you're looking to go with the natural look, this is the palette for you!   This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion . First off I love the packaging it immediately caught my eye and it fits so perfectly in my hand and fits so perfectly in a makeup bag for themakeup on the go days . From the moment you open the package, the shades just immediately catch your attention! Each shade is so different and stunning that you can achieve many looks from the palette from glamour to everyday wear . This should be in everyone’s makeup bag for everyday wear to on the go makeup . It has a little fallout when using the shades but the pigment is there with every shade even with the glitter . The eyeshadow lasted all day even without a eyeshadow primer . This eyeshadow opened me up to wanting to try more from this brand . I really loved everything about it and I hope she can make more eyeshadows for me to grab .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is a multidimensional utopia! This is one of the best palettes i have used in all my years in the beauty industry! It adds so much dimension to my eyes and seems to catch everyones attention! It's a paradise of buttery and versatile shades! They blend out beautifully with a brush or my fingers. The two shimmers shine to the heavens, the matte shades are striking, and together, they are an utter masterpiece!! My confidence radiates every time I use them! I can create so many different looks, and every single one is equally stunning! It's everything I could  want in an eyeshadow palette! The shades are all creamy and very comfortable to wear! I feel imaginitive and artistic creating each look! It's my new obsession! The pigment is perfection, and the color payoff is incredible! They last throughout my day, even when I'm sweating and wiping my eyes! It checks all the boxes for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the layout of this palette and I was easily able to get my brushes into the pans. I do wish that the lightest slightly gray beige shade was either more ivory or more gray. On my fair skintone, this did not show up much. However, I did use it to mix with some of the browns to get a lighter transition shade and that worked quite nicely. The mattes are very pigmented and blendable. They are a bit powdery but not too bad. I hardly ever use black eyeshadow but I created a shadow liner with it and it applied so easily and was pigmented but soft. I almost never do an all matte look but I tried it with this palette and it looked so pretty. The shimmers are a bit chunky which looks very pretty on the eye but when applied with a brush, I do get a good amount of fallout. You definitely get more intensity and less fall out with a finger application. I hope that they release more shades because I was very impressed with this and I want to pick up the other color way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a makeup lover i love to try and explore new brands and products. I love to do eye makeup. I heard alot of good thing for GXVE brand so i thought to grab their eye shadow palette. Simple kind of life it has amazing shades which i need to apply in my daily routine. When I opened the box,  I can't help by notice the beautiful packaging. This eyeshadow palette comes in stylish 6 shades. It had 2 metallic colors added the colors were long lasting and this color palette goes with anything and there is mirror inside so you could touch up your look! The presentation of colors is very rich.   The formulation makes is so easy for the shadow to glide on. These shadows are bendable and creamy. I usually prefer neutral shades so this palette was prefect for me. It is also travel friendly for quick and neutral eye makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First I really like the size of this palette, it’s easy to take on a trip and doesn’t take up a lot of space on my vanity. The shades on me are a warm pink and it creates a range of light to deeply smoked pink eyeshadow looks. The matte eyeshadows are a bit powdery in the pan but blend well on the eye (both with primer and without). The shimmers are nice but since the pan is so small it is tricky to use your finger to apply them. My finger doesn’t t fit completely and these have horrible application if you use a brush. That’s my biggest struggle with the palette - the shimmers need to be applied with a finger but the pan size makes that difficult. The looks I made lasted about 6 - 8 hours without eyeshadow primer and all day with. Overall I like the size and idea, the layout and quality of the shimmers could be improved. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rock a cute and confident look with the Eye See in Color Clean Multidimensional Eyeshadow Palette eyeshadow . As a beauty enthusiast , this simple kind of life palette is a must -have in enhancing the eyes. I love everything about it. The shades  are buildable and richly pigmented with a  matte shimmer neutral finish. This palette is color curated to easily create complete eye looks from everyday nude to amped up smoky.The blendable, creamy, no-crease , pressed powder formula makes it a lot easier to glide on and create beautiful, different, and impactful looks . The shimmer shades are gorgeous, and it's a perfect size. It's an eye-catching palette that helps create a dimensional finish. You definitely want to check it out. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow palette by GXVE by Gwen Stefani is wonderful for the cool toned lover because of the color selection and convenience for travel and if you want to do a quick neutral eye look especially if you’re short on time. I appreciate that this is a clean formula and the colors glide on so easily. However, the shadows kick up like crazy and the fallout especially with the shimmer and glitter shades. This is probably due to the fact it was soft milled so it is to be expected. I just can’t stand glitter fallout and need to go back and clean up the fallout under my eyes. The mattes blend beautifully which is a huge plus. I love the fact that the black eyeshadow is creamy enough to be used as eyeliner and I really like the cool layout of the shadows. It’s really eye catching and appealing. Overall, this palette is good.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Make Me Like You - matte & shimmer peach & rose gold
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have the “Make Me Like You” palette from GXVE and I absolutely love it. The colors are the perfect warm tones and this palette easily lets you transition your eyeshadow look from a day time eye to a night time eye. I love that the palette contains both shimmers and matte colors - thats super important to me with eyeshadow palettes. This is small enough that you can pop it in your purse to take with you but gives you enough flexibility to create different looks in the variety of colors provided within the palette. It also does come with a good size mirror. The shadows are pigmented, not chalky and are easy to work with and blend out. They can be applied with either your finger or a brush. I find that applying the shimmers with my finger is my preferred method because it helps pack it on there for maximum pigment. Overall, I definitely recommend this palette for someone who is looking for a great on the go, day to night palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually gravitate toward warm-toned eye shadow palettes because it compliments my tan skin tone. But I was pleasantly surprised how the cool-toned GXVE Eye See in Color Eyeshadow Palette in Simple Kind of Life accentuated my brown eyes naturally and beautifully. These cool-toned eye shadow colors, 4 mattes and 2 shimmers, work for both day and evening looks. My favorite way to apply these buttery smooth shadows is with a brush, which blends effortlessly onto my lids with minimal fallout. I didn’t notice any creasing at the end of the day and the colors looked as vibrant when I first put them on. My favorite eye look is applying the lightest tan matte all over my lid area, the lighter brown matte on the crease, and the darker brown matte to deepen the outer crease and line the lash line. For an evening, smoky look, I like to pack one of the gorgeous shimmer shades on to my inner lids, then line and smoke out my upper & lower lash lines with the jet black matte shade. I love how versatile, compact and sturdy the packaging is too which makes it great for travel.  As a beauty enthusiast, I highly recommend this cool-toned GXVE eyeshadow palette in Simple Kind of Life to anyone who who wants to create a multitude of eye looks, from nude to smoky, with pigmented, blendable, high quality matte and shimmer shadows. *This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Eye See in Color Eyeshadow Palette: The Simple kind of life eyeshadow palette is a cool tone lovers dream. Unfortunately that is not my dream color story. The matte shadows blend well on the eye and build up to a nice pigmentation. Some of the lighter matte shadows are kind of ashy looking on my brown skin . The shimmers in the Simple kind of life eyeshadow palette are nice. One of the shimmers in the palette is called Return of Saturn is a bit flaky and glittery . I do like the tone of the other shimmer. I feel like your finger is best to apply that shimmer in particular, or use a flat brush to pick up the shimmer first ,then spray your brush to get maximum color pay off. Also to lessen fall out from that  shimmer shade. . I do like the tone of the other shimmer,it applied easily to the lid.The shadows lasted all day on my eyes without fading away and creasing. I feel like this is a good every day palette to use. I personally just don't care for the color story of the simple kind of life eyeshadow palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast, I’m always looking forward to trying new brands and as soon as I heard Gwen Stefani was releasing a makeup brand, I knew I needed to try her products. This eyeshadow palette, especially this neutral color way, is perfect for beginners trying to learn how to do makeup. The pigment is just enough if you decide you want to keep it more subtle but just as easy to build it up if you want a more bold, glam look. I love how I can take this on the go with me for quick touchups throughout the day as well and find myself even using these shades to replace my other makeup products as well too. The shimmery shade also works great as a highlighter and and the soft brown tones work great as a bronzer in a pinch. Can definitely see this becoming my new favorite palette for everyday use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this complementary so I could review it and this is such a beautiful pallet. I love all of the different shades that you have the mats and the shimmer. The main light pink color that you can also see through it the shimmer are gorgeous. I’ve had zero problems with any fallout. I love that I can mix the base colors up with either shimmer shadow has a beautiful gold shadow and the pinky gold shimmer is beautiful. You can use it with your brush or you can just smear it on with your finger to get a little bit shinier rather than a result, you can really build this up. You can make a bunch of different looks with this. I have brown eyes and the combination is really just beautiful. This is just a great every day even tonight palette color is a beautiful color, but it has a hint of a light pink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing eyeshadow for as long as I can remember. I'm always looking for new pretty shades to add to my collection, but I'm also picky about the quality. These did not disappoint! I love the pretty shades and how well they match and compliment each other. These are warmer browns/peaches leaning. The colors are highly pigmented, but I noticed the glitter ones are more sheer which doesn't bother me as I love to blend the colors. The colors blend beautifully and feel like butter. The colors really bring out my brown eyes, but I feel it would bring out any eye color. The color lasted all day and didn't crease. These can easily be applied lightly for a day look, but can also be used for a more glam/night look. It's definitely a versatile and high quality palette that I know I'll keep coming back to.   This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: A simple kind of life palette
reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The GXVE simple kind of life eyeshadow palette is a surprisingly sturdy palette proving that it’s well made (made in Italy) with a nice clear mirror that’s actually usable for makeup application. Small but not too small so it’s the perfect size for on the go, in your pocket or purse. This is a clean product so no talc! Great neutral colors for an everyday look, work, or fall colors. Personally, I don’t like black in a palette but you can use it to smoke out your lids or as eyeliner. There are 2 sparkly shades too if you want to pump up your look and dazzle for a night look. The shades blend easily using a brush. The color pigmentation is good and stays on my lids even without eyeshadow primer. No fragrance. I recommend this as an everyday palette.   This review was collected as part of a promotion.

I was so excited to try this product out. I love the GXVE brand and what they stand for (vegan, cruelty free, clean beauty). This eyeshadow palette in the shade Simple Kind of Life offers a lovely mix of neutral, earthy tones that are perfect for creating both smoky eye looks and subtle evening glam. The palette design encompasses all shades needed to create a complete eye look - four matte and two shimmer shades.   While I love a smoky eye and palette, I did find myself wanting more light neutral shades as opposed to the standard dark browns and blacks. The shimmer shades are definitely more unique and fun to experiment with. I personally though had trouble creating a casual everyday look with this palette. Other than that, the quality is exceptional. Each shade has incredible pigmentation, is creamy smooth, and blends well. Also the packaging is next level chic! I recommend this product for anyone looking for a go-to all-in-one smoky eye set.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a 56-year-old who loves experimenting with eye makeup, I’ve tried many eyeshadow palettes. Still, the GXVE 'Eye See In Color' multi-dimensional eyeshadow palette in “Make Me Like You” truly stands out. This palette has become a go-to in my collection for its exceptional versatility and quality. With six beautifully curated shades, it offers a perfect blend of matte and shimmer finishes, making it easy to switch up my look from day to night or from subtle to bold.  What I really appreciate about this palette is the pigmentation. The colors are vibrant, giving full coverage with minimal product. The buttery texture of the shadows ensures they blend effortlessly, allowing me to easily create professional-looking results. Even after years of experimenting with different products, I’m impressed by how these shadows layer and blend to add depth and dimension without any fallout. It’s ideal whether you’re just starting with makeup or have been playing with it for decades like I have.  Another highlight is longevity. Even without an eyeshadow primer, these shades stay vibrant and crease-free for hours, making them perfect for long days or nights. I love that I don’t need to worry about touch-ups, even when I’m out and about.  The palette itself is sleek and compact, which is great for travel or for keeping in my purse for quick touch-ups. Despite its portable size, there’s a generous amount of product, so it’s a palette that lasts.  While it’s priced higher than some drugstore options, the investment is worth it. The combination of richly pigmented, long-lasting shades and overall versatility makes this palette a must-have for anyone who enjoys playing with different looks. If you’re looking for a high-quality, multifunctional eyeshadow palette, the GXVE 'Eye See In Color' in “Make Me Like You” is an excellent choice, especially if, like me, you love experimenting with your eye makeup at any age.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: A Neutral Color Palette everyone should have
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a new mom, who is slowly trying to find herself again and actually take time in the mornings to get ready, I was really excited to find this Palette! The warm tones are so natural, and very forgiving especially for someone who is sorta starting over with makeup (I swear I lost all my makeup skills right after I had a baby and went through postpartum) The colors are very buildable! that being said they are pigmented, but not overly pigmented, which means they can easily be layered and built up on the eye, for an easy natural look, but can definitely go more dramatic the more color you add. The ingredients are clean, which you can tell, because the product has caused no irritation to my eyes, which I appreciate, since it is almost impossible not to get some product in your eye when working on your lower lash line! Overall this is going to become a staple product in my makeup routine! Attached is the picture to show what the colors look like on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The EYE SEE IN COLOR palette in SIMPLE KIND OF LIFE is a true gem for makeup enthusiasts who value versatility and quality. Each shade in this palette is expertly curated, allowing you to effortlessly transition from everyday neutral looks to more dramatic, smoky eyes. The eyeshadows are incredibly creamy and blendable, with a buttery texture that feels luxurious to apply. The color payoff is impressive, delivering vibrant, multidimensional finishes that stay put without creasing throughout the day. What I appreciate most is the formula's versatility—it works beautifully with both brushes and fingers, making application a breeze.  This palette stands out not just for its performance but also for its ethos. Being clean, vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free, it aligns with a conscious lifestyle, so you can feel confident about what you’re putting on your skin. The inspiration behind the palette—Gwen Stefani's signature looks and her hands-on approach to makeup—adds a special touch, making it feel like you’re part of a backstage beauty experience. Whether you're a makeup novice or a seasoned artist, this palette is perfect for unleashing your creativity and finding the extraordinary in everyday makeup routines. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a huge Gwen Stefani fan… like since the No Doubt days… so I was super excited to try out her new eyeshadow palette. I originally opted for the brown, neutral palette but after seeing the pinky nude palette I changed my mind. The packaging is super nice and “high fashion”. It has a little weight to it without being too much. It’s made from plastic but doesn’t look or feel like it at all. The mirror is a nice size and crystal clear. The palette comes with six shades, two bigger pans of the base colors and four smaller pans with varying colors ranging from mauve to a rich, warm brown. There are two shimmer shades: a gold and a pink. The colors can take you from an office casual daytime look to a smoky, sultry evening look with just the addition of one of the deeper shades. The palette blends beautifully and stays put without creasing for hours.

reviews.review_text: As a makeup artist I am very impressed with this palette from Gxve beauty. I was given this palette for free in exchange for my honest opinion. The Make Me like you palette is a very flattering set of colors that can give you a variety of looks to create. It has everything you need to complete a look with a; base color, shimmer shade, crease color and outer shadow. All of the colors are nicely pigmented and blend easily on lid. reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast for the last 5 years, I have primarily focused on clean vegan and cruelty-free cosmetics. The pigments on this palette are so vibrant, and very bold. I normally don't typically prefer neutral shades, but the gold and silver shimmer shades, are absolutely beautiful. I believe in the power of expression through clean beauty, and Gwen Stefani with GXVE is GXVING us everything with this! I used the black pigment as a cat eye base, and followed it with the two metallic shades. I would say this particular palette is recommended for fair/light skin tones. I have a olive skin pigment naturally, so it matches well with my skin. I would absolutely recommend this to anyone, looking to make a bold new statement on their next big event!

As a makeup artist and skincare specialist, I always look forward to trying new products in the world of beauty. I was recently given the opportunity to try an eyeshadow palette-Make Me Like You. This beauty product is GXVE  by Gwen Stefani. I was given this product as a gift to give my honest opinion.  When I opened the box, you can't help by notice the beautiful packaging. This eyeshadow palette comes in such a stylish case with 6 eyeshadows. The presentation of colors is very rich. Having brown eyes I felt that the combination of colors would work well. reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a makeup enthusiast in my twenties, I’m always excited to explore new eyeshadow palettes, and GXVE by Gwen Stefani's Eye See in Color Eyeshadow Palette: Make Me Like You has truly impressed me. This palette offers a stunning range of shades that cater to a variety of looks, from everyday elegance to bold, dramatic statements.  The quality of the eyeshadows is exceptional. The formula is incredibly silky and blends effortlessly, which makes creating seamless looks a breeze. Each shade is finely milled and delivers rich, true-to-pan pigmentation. I’ve found that the shadows have impressive staying power, maintaining their vibrancy throughout the day without fading or creasing.  What I especially appreciate is how versatile the palette is. The range of hues, including both matte and shimmer finishes, allows for endless creativity. The matte shades are particularly noteworthy, as they are often hard to find with such smooth texture and blendability. Plus, there’s minimal fallout, which is a huge plus for maintaining a clean application.  The palette’s ability to achieve both natural, chic looks and more striking styles makes it a versatile addition to any makeup collection. Gwen Stefani has truly nailed it with this one—congratulations to her and her team for delivering a product that not only meets but exceeds expectations. I wholeheartedly recommend this palette to anyone who loves beautiful, high-quality eyeshadows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Eye See in Color GXVE Eyeshadow Palette is a vibrant and versatile collection that truly lives up to its name. Designed by the talented Gwen Stefani, this palette embodies her bold aesthetic while offering a range of shades that can suit any occasion, from casual daytime looks to glamorous evening ensembles. The palette comes in a sleek and stylish design, featuring a sturdy exterior with a mirror that is perfect for on-the-go touch-ups. The layout of the shades is well thought out, making it easy to navigate through the colors and create harmonious looks. What stands out the most is the impressive shade range. The palette includes a mix of matte, shimmer, and metallic finishes, providing endless possibilities for creativity. The colors vary from soft neutrals to striking jewel tones, catering to all skin tones and preferences. Whether you’re looking for a subtle wash of color or a bold statement eye, you’ll find something that fits the bill. The pigmentation of the eyeshadows is commendable. Most shades deliver intense color payoff with just one swipe, which is a huge plus for those who prefer quick application. The shimmers are particularly stunning, reflecting light beautifully without being overly glittery. One of the highlights of this palette is how easily the shadows blend. The formula is smooth and buttery, allowing for seamless transitions between colors. This makes it beginner-friendly, as well as enjoyable for more experienced makeup enthusiasts who appreciate a quick blend. In terms of wear time, the eyeshadows hold up well throughout the day. With a good eyeshadow primer, the colors remain vibrant and do not fade or crease, even after hours of wear. Overall, the Eye See in Color GXVE Eyeshadow Palette is a fantastic addition to any makeup collection.

reviews.review_title: Great eyeshadow that lasts all day long!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a woman with deep set eyes and honestly, applying eyeshadow is a real challenge for me; most shades just don't show up on me at all. But a Sephora Beauty Expert suggested that I try this pallet, but focus on the cool shades and gently apply the darker shades to give my eyes more of a pop. I was hesitant on this particular pallet bc of the dark shades. But I followed the advice of Jessica ( Beauty Expert) and used just one eyeshadow brush. I was amazed at how effortless the application was, and  my hazel/green eyes really brightened up. I have oily eyelids, so I applied a primer and used concealer on them and used my Beauty Blender sponge to apply a small amount of setting powder and applied the shadows. It worked and NO fallout. It's perfect for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This pallet has good looking everyday colors. It’s easy to apply, doesn’t clump up. Good everyday pallet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fair-light skin and this is a perfect every day eyeshadow for work. It stays on all day with a primer. Blends well. I’ll be repurchasing when I run out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I actually think that the colors are showing up and are easy to apply, they are very classy, very good mat colors. But I have a fair/light skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
