reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this palette! It’s perfect for matte only lovers and those who are fair. It creates beautiful fall looks! This is my must have!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Just A Girl - rose gold
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this eye palette for everyday use!!! Blends easily and lasts throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just received Just A Girl.  The color pallet is darker than the pics.  I wax expecting a nice rose gold, but this is more Orange/Brown.  Will be returning. :(

reviews.review_title: Cool tones in matte shades, pretty, versatile
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're wondering which of these gorgeous quad eyeshadows to purchase, I would start with this one. The colors are rich matte and glide on beautifully. I 😘 be the cool hues which are harder to find. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Cool Matte shades that are rich and highly pigment
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gorgeous matte eyeshadow is full of pigment and glides on effortlessly. The color lasts without fading. The best part for me was that it included cool tones, which were very complimentary to my skin. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Beautiful shade for blue eyes a must have it .
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving Gwen Stefani makeup line,2 eyeshadow that I purchased this shade makes my blue eyes stand out wow

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like the colors but they are very sheer, powdery, and don’t last long. I wouldn’t repurchase.

reviews.review_title: I get that it is a matte color story but
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am drawn to neutrals and this color story was appealing so bought it. A bit powdery, so expect some fallout/cleanup and I do wish there was a lighter base tone with one shimmer.  Thought about returning, but using this with other palettes to get a finished look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Buying another compact after loving it so much the first time around. Great level of pigment for my fair/light skin tone. The colors blend really well and feel smooth on my eyes. Doesn’t fade by the end of a long day. I can use this palette to create work or date night looks easily. Love this set!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly shocked this doesn’t have more better reviews! I feel that the pigment was beautiful and LASTED all day/night long ! Looked so beautiful on my brown eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was disappointed with the pallet when I received it after buying it online. The colours were darker and murkier than I had hoped. I returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed the performance of this quad as well as the color selection of browns for creating a latte eye look.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Colors not as pictured 😩. I did not return it though. I will use the colors but I do not particularly like them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s ok! I think you can get better. Also I don’t think that the colours are true to the site

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice set of neutral colors.  Great for a quick make-up or packing for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don’t be fooled by the darker pallet, these four colors create the perfect “natural” look and in a flash! Best part is that it stays on all day without budging!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first product I purchased from GXVE. It goes on darker than it looks in the pan; I have fair skin so that’s one of the results! It’s smooth and gives such a simple, natural finish and look. Definitely an everyday palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colors, gorgeous texture, easy to apply and blend, what more could I ask for?!

reviews.review_title: Great quad for easy out the door looks!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the simplicity of the colors in Simple Kind Of Life.  They are muted colors and super easy to wear.  They blend easily and stay on all day.  There is a little kick up in the pan when using but I didn't notice any fallout under my eye. This is my new favorite for clean/simple looks for days that I don't want any drama.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are blendable, but there is a lot of loose powder when applying to brush and lids. And don't be fooled, these colors are MUTED! Very very light.

reviews.review_title: It is OK for what it is
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Simple Kind of Life - it is what it is. The shadows are very creamy with minimal kickip and blend well. However, when they are on the eye they are all extremely similar with no way to achieve any contrast or depth. This pallet is great for a quick easy out the door look and so I am keeping it for that purpose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, notSure skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eyeshadow pallet. The colors are so beautiful and look awesome on. It gives a natural chic look. The eyeshadow is easily blend-able and there is no fall out. I feel like matte shades like this are hard to come by.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this set of cool matte neutrals! The quality is top notch. These are super silky and very blendable. The powder is finely milled, nicely pigmented, and long wearing! I am very pleased with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a fan. There is no rose about it. It looks yellow gold in person and there was something off about all the colors on me. It also didn’t spread or blend well. I LOVE everything GXVE but this just isn’t the quality I’ve come to expect and love about the brand

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a loyal MAC Cosmetics customer for over 20 years. But I gotta say I LOVE Gwens palette in Simple Kind of Life. It's the perfect neutral colours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my “ on the go” travel pallet I’ve been looking for! It’s perfect to take with me on all my trips and I use it daily when I’m home. I do with it was just a little warmer with the browns, but I still love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Expected something similar to UD in terms of quality, (since her collab palette with them was a fav for myself and so many others) but was immediately shocked at how useless the metallic shades were! Everyone else reviewing these saying the shades were unusable are NOT exaggerating, and the matte shades are nothing special on their own. I depotted this quad to keep the 2 mattes but also to reuse the case by adding a sheet magnet - interestingly, when I pulled up the black plastic the shadows sit in, there was a GXVE on the bottom inside of the case...nothing you could see unless you were cannibalizing the palette... I am sure it's an old design detail that was left in, but I couldn't help but laugh and find it ironic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible no color at all once blended it looks muddy, the color barely shows on tan skin. I should have read other reviews before buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was a  disappointing palette. I was hoping to be able to create an easy matte look with this, but I couldn’t  get it to work. On the skin, the  colours are very similar and the lightest shade is too dark. I also found them difficult to blend out.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice everyday palette.  Nothing outstanding but get for work or a casual weekend look.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found all of these shadows at Marshalls but bought only one, the simple kind of life. They are basically all the same shade with no payoff. So this entire palette is basically transition shades, which I 'm not mad at, but it is disappointing. I would not buy any other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It just really didn’t show up well on my eyes with enough contrast between the colors. So bummed because I wanted to love this particular palette so much! Maybe I’ll try one of the other 3 options though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought two of these palettes and for the life of me I can get no colour payoff. The fall out is insane, the eyeshadow is messy, and no matter what primers I use, this product doesn’t show up on my eyelids. Definitely don’t waste your money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Mattes are okay but shimmers are terrible. Chalky and zero payoff. Save your money and buy a $4 elf palette, much better choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Colors and payoff not enough to have in regular rotation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: initially excited for this product. I love the colours, and it goes on so nice.  I was misled with the ' clean at sephora ' label. This product contains Yellow 5 lake :(  I will be returning it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Simple Kind Of Life for about two months.  It is quite lovely.  I would say that this is a mostly neutral to somewhat cool palette except for the top right shade called Faithful To Freedom, which is a warm toasty camel shade.  I find it to last all day on my primed eyelids.  No fallout under my eyes though there is a bit of kick up in the pans.  Very understated looks in shades that compliment the green in my eyes.  Am curious to try more of these palettes out.  Quite pigmented as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pretty stoked to find this at Winners for $13 and thought, wow this product came out, that's a steal! so I picked it up and threw it on, the mattes are ok but faded pretty quick, the glitters look pretty in the package but apply like an eyeshadow palette from the drugstore. applies very thin, even tried packing the shimmer on with my fingertip and it still barely showed. I was looking forward to this because I love clean beauty and I love Gwen Stefani (especially her perfumes back in the day but this palette was not it unfortunately. Glad I only paid $13 lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to buy this pallet, but the eye shadows are very poor quality. They are chalky and do not stay on even with primer. The shadow just disappears. Test this out before you buy it and you will see the same. They do not blend well at all either. There are drugstore brands that make higher quality eyeshadow than this. This on the level of the children’s play make up that my partner’s kids used to put on me. With so much high quality make up out there, this not worth the buy even though the colors and packaging are amazing. Very disappointing. It is not down to this being vegan or cruelty free either because there are many brands that have much better eyeshadow, are clean, and vegan/cruelty free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this shadow for a few weeks now and love it.   The colors are wonderful, long lasting and feel good on my skin.    I will buy more for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this eyeshadow. It blends perfectly and the colors are so natural and it gives you a sophisticated and yet gentle look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this because on the pallet the colors looked beautiful, but when applied on my skin no pigment showed up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ll be honest I bought this based on the colors. I had no idea Gwen Stafani even had a makeup line. This palette is everything though. The colors are just perfect. They are buildable, blend extremely well and little to no fallout. It’s the perfect nude palette. I work in healthcare and don’t like to use noticeable colors. Have a feeling I’ll be going through this one quicker than any of my many other palettes.

reviews.review_title: NO BURNING EYES! The Most Underrated Eyeshadow
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best matte formula ever! And it's the ONLY eyeshadow that doesn't make my eyes burn. It reminds me of Charlotte Tilbury's The Sophisticate but I find this one is easier to get pigmentation. This formula is not powdery or too hard pressed in the pan, it's just right. One dip and you get amazing pigmentation even white the light bone shade. Also this is made in USA with no talc.

reviews.review_title: The pallet I grab for daily wear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The more I use Simple kind of life the more I love this palette. It is a complete nude and honestly makes my eyes look soft and dreamy. Definitely for the pale girls

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this on a whim because I love Gwen Stefani but ever since I got this little palette, I can't stop using it. It's pretty basic, just four neutral matte shadows but something about the shades is just perfect for everyday makeup. I find myself reaching for this when I'm in a rush and want to keep my eyes simple, these are perfect colors to just pop in the crease for a little dimension. The shadows themselves are buttery, blend easily and are buildable. My only cons is it is sort of messy (a lot of kick back when you put your brush in, think ABH shadows) and I don't think this particular palette would work for anyone darker than a medium skin tone, the shades probably wouldn't show up on deeper skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The colours online are different from in person. I find the shimmers fade throughout the day and the dark brown looses it's colour and depth as well. It's OK but it's not making me want to purchase another colour story

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought 3 of the 4 (not Rich Girl) and was certain at least one would go back. I rely heavily on reviews and saw a lot of mixed for these palettes. The colors are amazing! I am keeping all three. Yes there is a lot of kickback which kinda breaks my heart, but so do many of my more expemsive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am always looking for the perfect neutral shades. I find that I use every color in this palette, which is rare. I have 58 yr old hooded eyes, so creating a contour without looking like I'm trying too hard is tricky. The shadow is smooth and buttery, easy to blend and has good staying power. I haven't been this pleased with an eye shadow in a long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I picked this shade because I wanted a eyeshadow for natural daily makeup. It looks not bad on my arm, however, when I apply it on my eyes it looks like just darkness around the eyes. Tried at least three times but nah

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will purchase any and all cool toned makeup that I can get my hands on, considering warm tones have fully dominated the makeup industry for so many years.  I especially love cool toned neutrals.  These are nice, blend well, but I can only achieve a blown out smoky eye with this.  I cannot achieve opaque black with this, even when using primer.  If you are look for a densely pigmented black, the Sephora Collection black lace eyeshadow single is better, which I ended up buying after this.  I also suspect the individual shadow product size is a bit low on these, 0.03 oz per shadow?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Eye See In Color Simple Kind Of Life palette to test out and review; I’ve enjoyed using this palette because it’s easy to use when creating a quick look, the colours blend easily together but there is a lot of kickback when I dip my brush in the pan. Luckily it is easy to pick up the product and apply but it’s a bit messy. I like the two warm shades best, faithful to freedom and I was in love but the colours Covered in Shells and Obsessed are a little bit too cool and grey tones for my complexion. Overall it’s a good neutral palette but I reach for other palettes more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this palette. I am always on the hunt for a cool toned eyeshadow palette and this one fits the bill. This gives my Wayne Goss Smoky Quartz palette a run for its money. In fact, I think I like this palette better. And it’s half the price!

reviews.review_title: I never return products but this is going back
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was not what I was expecting…I don’t like the colours they are too yellow toned and not at all as pictured. They are chalky and pasty like from the drugstore so disappointed

reviews.review_title: One of the best neutrals I’ve found
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE these shades! I have fair skin and I prefer cool-toned eyeshadows with no shimmer, which can be extremely hard to find! I bought “A Simple Kind of Life” and all the shades in this are so flattering. Also very easy to use! So happy I found this.

reviews.review_title: Muted, understated, rare tones.  Great quality.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these when you want to keep it simple. Cool toned and understated- looks amazing with a nicely lined eye and dark mascara.  The quality is wonderful, does not age the eyes at all. I have this one and Just a Girl and they are both top quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The eyeshadow palette is the perfect traveling size, and the colors are quite lovely. I would say this product is beginner friendly, as the color is more of a wash. However, you can add more to make the colors more intense. I thought this was going to be my new favorite mini nudes palette, but what fell flat for me personally were the colors. The product photo makes the colors look more on the warmer side, but in person, the bottom two are definitely cooler. (The lower right color, looks more like a grey than a dark brown in person). Also there is a lot of fall out, personally I won't be repurchasing this particular product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Luxurious feel. Can apply as light or as dark as you desire. Highly pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: literally the 2 lightest shades dont show up. and the one that did grabbed to my skin making dark streak

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eyeshadow palette.  The colors are great if you are wanting a natural/neutral look.  The quality of the shadow is outstanding because it is light (great if you want to layer for a more dramatic look), with a silky finish.  I will order this palette again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the colors and the matte finish! Gorgeous just like Gwen!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you want a beautifully created earth toned shadow quad that you can wear year round with great color payoff you need to get this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't typically do complicated, time consuming make-up looks.  I prefer the healthy, wash of color look.  The trouble with that is most brands include a lot of shadow with pink/peach undertones, which is not always flattering on me as a middle-aged woman.  My lids are pigmented so I need shadows that balance that out (primer just adds another layer that can   crease by the end of the day).  This palette is FANTASTIC.  Its not going to pop but it will definitely give you a classic, understated, long wearing option.  Its just enough without being too much or too obvious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great matte eyeshadow . The colors work well on light skin. They are really subtle and blend well.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Totally worth the money! Blends beautifully and love the colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this palette after looking for an everyday matte option. I love this! I used a store brand eye primer and had no creasing on oily eyelids. This is a perfect palette for me. I have a bazillion shimmers, I can add a pop on if I want. Definitely a new staple for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Good everyday palette: lacks pigment, hard to build. Super cute good quality packaging.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Simple Kind of Life palette as part of a gratis package and am sharing my honest and authentic opinion as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador. The eyeshadows are buttery and go on beautifully but the colors in this quad will not be for everyone. The shades are understated and for all but those with fairer skin tones. That said, the colors in this quad are ones I enjoy. My usual go-to eye look involves a just wash of a neutral nude or brown color and mascara on curled lashes. If I spend more time on my eye look, I’ll add eyeliner, usually a liquid formula. For a simple eye look, this quad will be a good fit for those with fair-to-light skin tones.

reviews.review_title: Nice formula for layers and blending
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I originally did not want to support any more celebrity brands but I was searching for talc free eye shadow. This was the only talc free brand option for purchase in store. I did love all of the color options available and chose simple kind of life for my everyday looks on my light/fair skin. The formula is very soft and powdery so it is easy to blend . You may not like this if you don’t like shadows that are very soft in the pan. I like any type of formula so it works for me. The lightest shade is is invisible on my skin so I use it to blend or put down a base. Even though I love the formula and colors I don’t think I will repurchase due to plastic pallet component, I am slowly trying to cut down on plastic consumption and wish this was cardboard packaging instead of plastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Was super excited after having swatched the colors on my hand. Unfortunately all three brown shades were very patchy, chalky and overall hard to use. The cream shade is good but still quite chalky. I love that the packaging was made more eco friendly but it’s ridiculously hard to open. With that said definitely will not be repurchasing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it!!! The quality is awesome. So happy I decided to try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Velvety and gorgeous.  I don't understand the negative reviews at all.  The formula is absolutely brilliant.  The colors are soft and muted but totally buildable.  This is not crazy glam palette, there are other brands to do that.  These pallets are really stunning with great color payout and no fallout!  I'm adding this to my must have on hand at all times makeup kit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the colors for my everyday look! love the GXVE line :)

reviews.review_title: A great take on a neutral palette
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it when neutral palettes are approachable.  I've seen so many with wild colors, or ones that are way too ruddy.  For me, this hits the mark for a subtle look.  I'm kind of a klutz with neutrals, so I loved that this has tips for application.  If you are struggling with color pay-off, try a good primer to even things out.  The texture is nice - the right amount of not too dry and not too creamy.  Full disclosure: I received this as gratis from Sephora

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great texture and coverage, very light coloring. The color pallet has more pinkish brown tones on my monitor and in reality these are much more brown. It is not really my best shade, but I am keeping it for day and casual wear because the matte formula applies nicely. Good matte pallets with clean ingredients are hard enough to find.

reviews.review_title: Review Not Chosen but I Purchased
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has happened to me once before, in which my review was not chosen. I have this palette (unfortunately), and I purchased it from Sephora. I just want to let everyone know that I was excited about this palette, and typically I do not care about fallout. But this palette had fallout on another level. I could have dealt with that, if the quality was good, but when I tell you that I would actually rather go to the drug store and use covergirl or revlon, I am not lying. This palette doesn’t blend, very patchy, every single shade was like this. It all looked like 1 color rather than 4, because the colors literally blend away. Reminded me of subculture, except without hardly any pigment lol. You can’t pack on the color either, because if you do then it’s patchy and chalky. I am skilled at eyeshadow looks, but there was nothing to really do that could save my look both times I tried it. I wiped it off and started all over with a different palette. Not to mention, this palette is so so expensive. I am sad about this not working out, and I want to save anyone I can from buying this quad.  I really do prefer covergirl shadows over this, and I only have/buy luxury eyeshadows. I say this to express how chalky and unblebdable this quad was. And I’m very pale by the way. I can’t imagine this working at all for someone who is darker than me. Save yourselves and pass it. I rarely write reviews. But the people have to know about this one lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the quality of the eyeshadows and how easy they blend! I found that the shimmers work best and have the most pigment when applied with my fingers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great formula, great color stories, but shades run towards the cooler side of the undertone spectrum. If you don’t have cool undertones, then these may not be for you unless you layer over other shades from warmer toned palettes.

reviews.review_title: Colors not what they appear online in person.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product looking at the colors online. The colors show here are not what is in the palette.  The rosegold color on the bottom left in person appears yellow gold not pinkish at all. I purchased this palette purposely for this specific color. Disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bad bad bad don’t waste your money, so soft it muds out!! Over 30 yrs experience and this is the worst muddiest formula, I just don’t get it?! I sure love Gwen though her voice is better than her makeup 100% don’t even bother it should cost $4.99 Astronomical price too!! Passsss hard passss I warned you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is the perfect matte combo out there!!  These are the neutrals that I normally look for but haven't found in one palette, until now.   Great color payoff and blend very well.   I also love the fact that Gwen didn't price gouge on her products, as most celebrities do.

reviews.review_title: Simple kind of Life a bit too simple
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to love this set because the quality is through the roof, but the colors don't really match the photo and don't show against my light skin tone.    The bottom two shades look identical in my kit, but as shown above, the right side should be darker than the left. I had to supplement with a second darker shadow and highlight to get the result I expected in one kit. Undermines the point of a set.   BUT it's great as a base color blend, it goes on smoothly without rippling or creping my eyelids. Works well for contacts, no itching or smearing,    Photo shows full application of SKOS, all 4 shades  with no other eye shadows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I was looking for a good quality talc-free eyeshadow palette. It was exactly what I was looking for and the pigmentation is great! Very wearable everyday makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to get one of her palettes and this one really appealed to me - it was my “Goldilocks palette” because of the other ones one was too warm, one was too cool and one was too blah lol ;) These shadows have good pigmentation and last pretty well and  I  really love the packaging-it kind of reminds me of her colab with urban decay. I hope she comes out with more products!

reviews.review_title: Amazig quality. Ended up buying them all.
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, first I'll say I wasn't excited by any of the color quads at first, but I trusted Gwen and bought one anyway. Not only didn't it irritate my eyes, it ended up being my go-to.  Gwen knew better than me what I needed for every day.  So, I tried another and the same thing. Became a go to.  I now have them all and I don't use anything else.  Stays put.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had high expectations for a neutral palette without shimmer but this formula is pretty much invisible. I have fair skin and it still doesn’t show up. I have $3 drug store pallets that perform better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I swatched this quad I wasn’t impressed-the colors felt “too light”.  However, when I used them on the eyes they went on beautifully.  Very easy to blend and perfect for an everyday, simple look.  I absolutely love this quad and have been using it everyday!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador. Note that this rating is only for the eyeshadow quad in Simple Kind of Life, which unfortunately, was too light for me. In the photos, I’m wearing 3 of the 4 shades (all except the light pink shade), but I don’t think you’d be able to tell. For example, I tried to add some depth to the other two shades I already had on by applying the shade “Obsessed” to the outer corners of my eyes (see photo 1), but the output looks more like a single wash of colour (see photo 2). Photos taken with different DSLR settings. I’m a bit befuddled how to use this quad on its own. It looks more like a quad that needs to be paired with other shadows to really make it work. To be honest, I have no idea what to do with the two shades on the left half of the palette. The taupe shade didn’t do much for me in terms of colour payoff and the light pink is even worse… I really wish the light pink was a shimmer instead of a matte so it could be used as a highlight in the inner corners and brow bone. I think that would’ve redeemed this palette so you could at least get a more cohesive look. All the other quad versions have at least one shimmer. Anyway, the one shade I did appreciate was the top right shade, “I Was in Love,” which is a beautiful transition shade that reminds me of my beloved shade Buck from the UD Naked palette. If I were to reach for this palette, it would mainly be for this transition shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Blends like a dream.  Perfect for a no-makeup makeup day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Simple Kind of Life palette for free in exchange for this review.  I actually really like this palette more than I originally thought I would. The shadows are really easy to work with. Brushes pick them up nicely, they blend easily, and there's no fallout. It's a nice palette for putting together a simple, day look. My only gripe is that all the shades are matte in this palette and I prefer to mix textures. So this palette isn't a standalone option for my collection. I'd love to see how the shimmer formulation performs. It should also be noted that these shades likely won't compliment all skin tones, as these shades are extremely light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't see the issue here, I think it's an excellent mix of warm and cool neutrals. I can definitely see the difference between the 4 colors. They feel like any other powder shadows, not creamy but not super dry either. Somewhere in-between. I was really worried about purchasing this quad because of the reviews but I'm glad I chanced it and picked it up because it's perfect.

reviews.review_title: it's pretty, pretty bad. still love Gwen.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: l buy just about everything Gwen Stefani stamps her name on. LAMB bags, Harajuku Lovers, Tragic Kindgom tour... I lived through it all and bought it. Her UD Collection as well.  ----- I was really hoping this would have a better formulation than the neutrals in her UD palette but it seems like that kind of chalky dust formula is her actual preference. To each their own.   This reminds me of a mid-90's eyeshadow formula; that's not a great thing! If yall remember going to a M*C counter and leaving with a dud shadow single. Same deal.  Swatch in store if you are dead set. Kind of bummed this is too light to even use as brow power, where formula is less an issue.

reviews.review_title: Very nice palette for blue eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely colors, very blendable and this palette is awesome for blue eyes. I prefer non shimmery colors and this does it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye shadow formula is super creamy and buttery and it is so easy to blend. These shades are bery subtle on me so I'm thinking of buying the other three color combos to mix and match!!!  *Gifted

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this and disregarded other reviews as to the discrepancy in the colors but… what I received was NOTHING like what’s pictured. Not at all rosey or peachy but very yellow/rust/gold and not in a good way. Look at the pics on other reviews- I’d hoped theirs was a fluke, I took a chance. RETURNED

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In the photo, the colors appear cooler than they really are. I'll try mixing them with pinkish shades to cool them down but, still, disappointing.

reviews.review_title: One of the best eyeshadows I have used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best eye shadows I have used. With a properly primed eye it goes on smoothly and is super easy to blend without being chalky. The eyeshadow is buildable and can be layered to be darker. Using a dense brush for the glitter it went on great blending well with the non glitter eyeshadow. Very easy to use I would recommend for beginners as it is easy to apply and for anyone else who loves eyeshadow. I did find the packaging hard to open. Over all a fantastic product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this to try and replace the discontinued original Naked Basics by Urban Decay. I would say it’s pretty darn close, it applies easily and blends great. It has a good amount of pigment and and I don’t have to work too hard to get the look I want. Lasts as long as I need it and no creasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: meh, it's ok. I wouldn't say it's a must have staple in your makeup bag. the colors are pretty but too basic neutral still, the colors don't show the dramatic smokey eye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t normally go for cool tones but something about this quad spoke to me (lol) and I bought it. I can say that I was super impressed with the shadow quality and the ease of use with this. I will probably buy another one because I loved this one so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good colors, long lasting, blends well. Love that it meets Sephora’s clean standards

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely a warm colour story.  Not pink like the product photo.

reviews.review_title: Shades aren’t the same as the photo
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The palette itself is ok but the pink shimmer shade definitely pulls orange. Not just on the lid but in the pan as well. I don’t feel the picture accurately represents what you get. Will be returning. I recommend the formula if you see the shades irl and they meet your expectation; best not to buy online.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I first opened this palette up and was a little under whelmed. It wasn’t anything special but once I used it on my eyes I can see why she created this palette. I’ve been wearing it every day and using the eyeliner in bathwater. It’s perfect for an everyday look!

reviews.review_title: Basic Becky and I'm loving her!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: it's a nice all matte pallete and the color story is nice and muted. great for one and done looks also travel or just throw in purse or makeup bag for everyday looks. it isn't as pigmented as the other GXVE palette I bought, but it is a basic Betty's dream and I'm happy to have it in ky collection.  I am a Gwen fan from way back, but I was on the fence about another celebrity brand.  I have to say, the brand is on point for Gwen.  the packaging is kinda weak but the product is good and that's most important to me. the amount of product and tye price point seem to be on par with competitors.  I look fwd to trying other products by the brand,, especially the brow pencil. Can't wait for what's yet to come out next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really disappointed with this product.  Maybe it was the color that didn’t look great in me. I ended up returning it.  So disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this palette!! The formula was buttery and very pigmented. A little went a long way. It’s the perfect neutral palette for an everyday look. I would suggest this also for a cute day time coffee date. It’s simple and beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a person who has used cheap as well as expensive eyeshadow palettes, this is not worth $28. I ordered Just a Girl (rose gold) and the colors were not as they appeared online- more coppery instead of rose gold. Way too orange. Also, the quality and color payoff just wasn’t there. Very disappointing. I returned it.

reviews.review_title: Great basic pallet, no fuss and easy to use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a small neutral pallet to replace my urban decay smokey pallet.  It was a pretty good replacement for a smokey eye, tho i really wish urban decay would reboot the smokey pallet.  It blends well with almost no fallout.  Only thing i noticed what that the sparkly black turns out matte black on the eye.  The sparkles dont show up, which i preferred anyway.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not think I would like this quad at first because the shades are so light. But I have been using them as a brow powder and they are fantastic! It is very hard for me to find brow products light enough. I received this gratis for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This finger swatch on my wrist- 2 swipes each explains why I returned this yesterday 1 day after it arrived. If you can see the swatches.   The formula is smooth, velvety and kicks up a lot and that’s what I want in a matte. I was expecting so much more.   I’m very pale and this should’ve shown up on me but instead it was barely there.   The 4 shades all blended into each other leaving no definition except a faint peachy tone for the upper right crease shade.   Upper left- transparent pale flesh tone. Really transparent!   Upper right is a soft terra cotta shade that leaves a pale peach tone. Best shade in the quad- it showed up and didn’t totally blend away.   Bottom 2 are both a greenish khaki grey. So near each other that they are essentially the same shade. They make the entire look into a greyish blotch on the eye and blend into each other immediately.   I used my best bulletproof eye primer that always works well (Milani) and it was awful. I’ve had better quality at the drugstore.   I don’t try to rescue bad products- they go back. Things I keep have to perform without a struggle. I don’t exist to make my makeup work, my makeup needs to work every time I pull it out. This just isn’t up to my standards.   I’m sure some people will make this work using higher level makeup skills or other magic touches but I’m just not.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot express how much I love this quad. All the colors play well together and the color wash they leave behind is what I have been searching for.  It’s a very effortless, off duty model look that is super easy to use and no matter how I put the colors on it looks nice. This is not going to create a dramatic look, I feel like it’s best for a subtle vibe, and brings out eye color naturally. I get a lot of complements when I wear it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a gift from Sephora and Gwen Stefani.  I don't love the color story in this Quad.  I would probably have chosen one of the other Quads for that reason.  I think the best use for this palette is to use only one shade as a base shadow, wear alone, or adding colors from another palette. My skin coloring is fair to light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these matte shades! Blended well and pigmentation is great. I was able to wear them the entire day without irritation. Made my blue eyes really pop. Ordered more products from this line because I was so happy with the eyeshadows!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've only tried the Simple Kind of Life (matte neutral) from the GXVE palette line, so I'm not sure if this review can be generalized to the other palettes in this line. This particular palette doesn't have a ton of pigment, and it was a little difficult to differentiate between the various shades. The formula is a bit dry and powdery, but I found that it worked just fine as an all over base shade. I wouldn't use this palette for a complete look, but I think it's useful to have on hand for a nice foundation/base eye shade. I personally didn't experience any issues with creasing, which is also a plus. I'll be curious to try some of the more pigmented palettes from this line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, so I read every single review that I could find and watched any/all YouTube first impressions on this product bc frankly, the reviews were all so mixed! I'm not a Gwen super fan (but obv love her, she rocks)--I was interested in talc-free Clean at Sephora eyeshadows. I didn't know what to make of it, but decided to pull the trigger during the sale. For context, I have light colored skin and brown hair, and this palette is the perfect shade match for me. I'm a one and done eye gal, definitely not a Patrick Ta full palette kind of person at all. The pink is a perfect lid shade, the toasty nude color could honestly work as a lovely face contour shade, the lighter brown is a dupe for Jane Iredale's cult Cappuccino shade (which looks gorgeous as a wash on the lid), and the deeper brown shade is certainly not green or khaki as reviewers state and works beautifully as a brow powder with an angled brush! The formula is creamy thanks to the squalane, and since I'm well versed in talc-free eyeshadows I can say the kickback is minimal and not an issue for me. In fact, I swatched this on my arm next to some Mob Beauty eyeshadows in similar shades, and the GXVE is not actually matte--there's very fine mica shimmer. It's gorgeous. My one ding would be the packaging--feels cheap and mine rattles as if it's about the fall apart any minute. I won't dare travel with this lest it cracks open.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just went blonde so picking up some stuff from Gwen’s new collection was a no-brainer for me. I was able to swatch these in store, and to me this color story was the most unique to my collection and seemed to go best with her signature red lipstick that I also picked up.   The packaging is nice, if a little hollow feeling. Both the lipstick tube and compact are made of lightweight plastic, but the construction seems sturdy and the mirror is quite nice. This quad is a great size for traveling and fits nicely in a small purse or clutch. The shadows themselves are a bit dry, but they didn’t produce too much kickback using a flat shader and a Mac blending brush. I also tried using my fingers, application was smooth either way. I’d still recommend using a brush with this, though. . I was able to produce a really simple and flattering look with it without very much effort. I thought the shadows were smooth and easy to blend. They didn’t get muddy or stress my skin out like some matte eyeshadows.    The shades pictured look darker on the website and in promo shots and although the darkest shade has some loose sparkle present in the pan, it falls squarely into the matte category for me. The darkest shade reads as a neutral toned very dark gray, the two brown shades vary more in depth on skin than they appear to in the pan, and the ivory shade is quite pigmented, reading brighter than anticipated on my skin.   We will see how this holds up, but overall I’m pretty impressed! I worked over the Sigma eye primer in ignite, seen here worn with Charlotte Tilbury Hot Lips 2 in Amazing Amal—can’t wait to try a smoky eye with a red lip.

reviews.review_title: great tones works on brows too.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shades called my name. Everyday nude quad I could also use on my brows. It works. It is powdery. One reviewer suggested use a fingertip to apply. I'll try it this way. Great color story though. Perfect Basic eye quad to pair with a bright lip!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Simple Kind of Life, simple kind of palette. I tried to play with this several ways. All the shades just looked completely the same on my skin. It was impossible to create a full “look” as the colours muddled together and always looked like I put a nude shade on. The formula itself has a fair bit of fall out even after aggressively tapping my brushes. I’m seeing some positive reviews for other palette shades so maybe it’s just this one. I received this from Sephora as gratis.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: While the road to neutral is paved with good intentions, I struggled to find a sense of purpose with this quartet of barely-there beiges. Faithful to Freedom and I Was in Love are so neutral that in swatching, that finding the initial placement on my skin to apply a second layer was a challenge. Covered in Shells gave my skin an unflattering ‘muddy’ look, while Obsessed worked somewhat in my crease to provide minor definition.  As an accompaniment to a bold red lip, a simplified eye frames the look. However, this acts more like a foundational base that necessitates additional dimension.      Shades aside, the formula is mildly chalky, most noticeably the FTF pan. The biggest upside here is the talc-free formula, but I would not see myself purchasing this palette for that alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great for everyday eye contouring no makeup natural look.  The directions say use fingertip.  Please do.  It goes on better with this pallet for me and so easy for a day to day simple kind of life !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely IN LOVE with rose gold…. And this palette does me justice….. I am obsessed with this palette

reviews.review_title: It’s a big NO for me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this palette, and the neutrals looked perfect for me, but I will be returning (which I never do).  The bottom 2 shades are pretty ashy IRL.  Not a good thing on my cool toned skin.  The top 2 shades are nice if you are looking for very light nudes.  BUT, on top of the shades being really disappointing, the texture and payoff of these shadows is really poor.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Color does not transfer well on skin. Almost a sheer shade of all 4 colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a whole palette this fell way flat for me. No combination of colors worked, it all looked the same, and were hard to see. Now each color on their own I give 5/5, except Covered in Shells that one didn't work for me. Alone they all applied very smooth and lasted my 12 hour hot sweaty work shift.  These are my honest opinions as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador, and I did receive this as a gratis from Sephora.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.  At first swatch I was a little hesitant with wanting to use the palette because two of the bottom shades were very cool tone grayish (Covered in Shells and Obsessed).  It seemed too light for my MAC NC25 skin tone.  As soon as I dipped my brush into the pan and put it on my lids it felt chalky and didn’t have enough pigmentation.  When applied, the top two shadows barely showed up on my lids.  I used the very light shade (Faithful to Freedom) on the upper left as the all over lid color and the next darker shade on the upper right (I was In Love) as the buffing/contour color.    I didn’t want to even try the two bottom shades in fear that it would make my lids look muddy.  I think this palette may work better for fair skin tones only.  On the bright side, the packaging is chic and cool.  I love the design but think maybe one of her other palettes would have been better suited for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this palette!  I realized these browns are on the cool side rather than warm.  This is much better for my skin and hair tone. . I haven’t used the black yet and I use the darker brown as an eyebrow filler. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way.  A lot of pigment that lays all day.  Use a little as that’s all you need and you won’t have much fall out.  The rose gold is not pink it’s a golden color that has pink and orange tones (rose gold)  I would buy again due to how long this lasts and stays in place

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes along way!  No need to use a lot and it’s last through the entire day even through my nap.  This is best used sparingly as you don’t need a lot due to the pigment.  Little fallout when used with brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very chalky was extremely disappointed I was looking so forward to using this, it turned out very muddy hard to blend and patchy I wouldn’t recommend this at all! I’d give it a zero if I could. I actually bought both pallets tried both of them a couple of times before I made my true decision probably one of the worst formulas I’ve ever used in my entire career!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gwen Stefani does it again, yet another hit on her hands this time with her newly released makeup line GXVE, it’s nothing less than perfection, can’t wait for the release of item in this amazing line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love these shadows! Beautiful mattes. I can make them look subtle or darken them up for a fabulous smokey eye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful matte shadows. They are light, but if I want a red lip I think a subtle eyeshadow looks great. Even Gwen has a pretty light shadow a lot of the time and focuses on her beautiful red lips.

reviews.review_title: Not a fan of this particular color story
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador. I was sent this palette from @TeamBIC and GXVE, Thank you so much!  When I saw the palette, I thought that is was way too light for my skin tone and it is, but I was able to make it work. I am sure that the other quads are better (more of my liking) and I would have rated them better. PROS: - It is a clean at Sephora brand, cruelty free, vegan, gluten free and with recyclable packaging. - I love that all the products come in clean, modern, chic looking recycled cardboard boxes that have a gorgeous design inside. - The palette box is Mae of plastic and has a matching cardboard background with white and gold letters. I find it so beautiful! It doesn’t feel too heavy so it is great to take on trips. - It doesn’t have any scent. - It comes with a mirror which is always a plus. - It looks like the the four eyeshadow pan can be removed from the package. I don’t know if it is just the way it is or if they will be offering refills. CONS: - The shadows are defined by the brand as buttery but they are the opposite (at least Simple Kind of Life) It is very powdery, with lots of kickback. I am used to ABH shadows so this is not a problem for me. - Also, the brand defines the shadows as highly pigmented and they are not. I needed to pack and pack and pack product in order to get some payoff and ended up looking muddy because of that. - Two of the shadows look almost the same once blended into the skin. This palette doesn’t allow for many looks because of the similarity of the shades and the lack of depth.  - I am missing a deeper shadow and a shimmery shadow to consider this palette a winner, but I can understand that it is just because of my taste and this one fits perfectly lighter skin tones and soft makeup lovers. - I find it expensive for the quality of the shadows.

reviews.review_title: Expecting a high quality shadow, was disappointed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really expecting a very high quality, high pigmentation shadow set and instead received more fallout and very little wear.  I tapped the excess before application and used a high quality shadow brush, but still had flecks under my eye.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this palette a deal though I slightly wavered between three and four stars I went for four because it has a lot more going for it than the minor thing i would choose to adjust if  I could. starting with the major plus sides it has a smooth texture, long-lasting color that doesnt seem to turn chalky during the day and enough shades but no too many where some get skipped because they don't necessarily complete a look. often times a bigger palette there are a bit of shades that get neglected this one leans towards a non wasteful and verstitle quad. the one place where I felt there could be a smidge of  changer per chance would making the darkest shade a bit deeper to smoke out the eye look just a smidge more. however, that can be an easy fix if you have a slightly deeper shade on hand in your collection so that you can adjust the eye look a bit when preferred.  overall four stars.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought the Simple Kind if Life palette- Fabulous matte colors that stay on all day/evening without creasing. Colors looked light on the palette, but had the right depth of color when worn. Perfect for work/daytime or casual evening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the nude colors and they do blend nicely.  But the fallout is horrible and you need to layer to get a really great payoff of color.  I have had it two weeks and because there is so much fallout it already looks like I used over 50% of the one color.  Why Gwen, why!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am medium to dark skinned so idk why they sent me the lightest palette. But honestly it is wearable. Like if I was going on a vacation and wanted simple muted makeup I could definitely take this. Maybe a business trip. I know if applied correctly this would be able to show on people lighter than me. Even my friend when she saw me in person said it shows better in person than on picture but, that is fine if you are looking for something more classic. Because Of this I will be purchasing the one with the deeper shades because I know it will be good quality. No fall out, didn’t all break apart with a few taps. The first photo is only attached because you can see the shadow more clearly on my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this, but was let down. There's so much fallout, it's ridiculous. Super powdery. On the plus side, I still really love 2 of the colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I literally wear this pallette a few times a week for work. Why? Because it stays on all day, I have oily skin so normally other brands crease. Not this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Hallmark of a good eyeshadow for me is color stay, good blending, and barely to no fallout of the powder. The colors I chose blend well, average wear, but I noticed a lot of fallout (loose powder). I had higher hopes for this cause I do afliate Gwen with good quality make up. Unfortunately, I won't buy this again it just didn't live up to my expectations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I needed an everyday palette with flattering neutral colors to help my eyes pop. Not too dramatic not boring- Mission Accomplished. Another victory for Gwen!!

reviews.review_title: Beautiful, saturated daytime eye shadow, love it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eye shadow!  The colors are subtle but really saturated, perfect for a daytime look.  And clean formulation which is important to be, I have allergy prone eye area and a lot of najeup is irritating. Everything I've bought from the GXVE line has been amazing. I bought it cause I'm a big Gwen Stefani fan but am going back because the products are really good!

reviews.review_title: So Happy I purchased a second Pallet!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So, I was initially disappointed when I opened the box. I thought the colors would be deeper or have more pigment, however when I put them on and blended the pallet in I was pleasantly surprised! So happy that I actually bought a Second pallet, I love the way her shadows blend and you can use as a day look or go a little heavier for an evening look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I read all the negative reviews and just don't get it. The packaging was great. Very good design and her style for sure. I found the shadows to be a fantastic quality. I use Natasha Denona on an everyday basis. Yes there was a lot of fall out in the pans but zero on my face. I created a nice matte neutral eye as I had intended. The shadow was soft and buttery. I love a smaller pan size there days. I'll buy again if she comes out with some more colors. Loved it. Pricey but you get what you pay for!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a Sephora beauty community ambassador and this is my honest and authentic review of this product. The shades in the picture look more pink than what it looks like in person. Nothing super impressive about this palette. Extreme neutral for a quick on the go look. The packaging is cute but insanely hard to open. It definitely needs more to wow me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Idk why there are so many negative reviews for this. I LOVE this. I understand that this isn't a palatte for very dramatic eye looks but that's pretty obvious from the get-go just from looking at the picture. This palatte is good for subtle contoured eye looks. Also, as a fair-light complexion girl, I love this palatte for face/nose contour! Perfectly neutral-cool.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gratis for testing purposes. The eyeshadow palette is more pigmented that I originally thought it would be; loads of kickback and some fallout; soft and blends out nicely but the shades are way too similar to each other when you lay them on the eyes, color story is not my cup of tea and there’s no shimmers in this particular palette to give it that wow factor to your looks. Great for work environments that require minimal or very subtle eyelook. so if you like an all matte neutral palette this baby is for you

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The powder has a creamy texture and applies well to the eyelids. However, there is a lot of powder loss in the case. The choice of shades is varied and interesting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not impressed at all. Colors are extremely muted. Feels very average.

reviews.review_title: if I was Rich Girl nananana…
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m surprised by all the negative reviews. They made me almost not purchase this palette but I’m a big Gwen fan & had to lol I’m very happy with the one I purchased, I can’t speak for the others however. The shadows are super smooth & easy to apply, show up vibrant & blend so lovely. I’m fair skin too btw. The packaging doesn’t feel/look cheap to me & is really pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are DULL colors for eyeshadows - however PERFECT colors for eyebrows!! The bottom 2 are great taupes and the reddish shade is perfect for auburn eyebrows! However I’m returning this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve really enjoyed the palette overall even though I’m not typically into cool tones. The shades blend very nicely but the black tone is super patchy which is q bummer. I was also shocked how dusty the shades are! The pay off good plus didn’t have fall out on my face so it’s not a deal breaker but man I’m going to hit pan much sooner than later. I have it a 3 due to price and how much kick back because I feel the formula could have been much better. I also wished the mid tones Would have been more of a contrast to each other.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this palette, however, it's very chalky when I try to pick it up on the brush. Having said that, I really enjoy the subtly of these colors. I love color pay off as much as the next gal but these are colors that go on very light so if you want more impactful color you will have to build it up a few times but I notice with this palette a little goes a long way! If you want a natural and understated look then this palette is for you!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shadows were described as buttery but the reality is they're dry and chalky. I expect half of the product will end up on the countertop. Even worse the colors are dull - big disappointment.

reviews.review_title: Love this! Doesn't irritate my eyes. Lasts all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for neutral makeup days and it is fantastic! It stays put all day long and even if I rub it accidentally, no irritation. Really impressed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is just so disappointing. I’m light medium skin tone and none of these color show up on my skin. The pigment is terrible. I tried it again this time GXVE on one eye and the other eye was a ColourPop shadow in almost the same shades and I was shocked at how much better the pigment was and how blendable a shadow pallet have the cost was. This is definitely going back

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Danger Zone palette is really nice for lovers of cool-toned shadows. While there is a lot of kick up, they blend nicely and last all day. I also got the Just a Girl palette and was not impressed with the shimmers. They don't pick up well on a brush and there is a lot of fall out in big chunks. The matte shades are definitely better. Also, I don't feel rose gold is an accurate description. It's more of a bronze color on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: if you're looking for a natural makeup, no makeup look then this is lovely. It's very powdery but if you tap off the excess it blends nicely and doesn't crease all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hav been waiting for this shadow palette for years. I loved the naked2 palette and when it got retired I was never able to find a perfect smokey brown/black palette I liked without glitter. This 4 shadow palette is so perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love this cool tone mini palette. makes a perfect subtle smokey eye. love the slight sparkle in the matte black.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unlike the other reviews, I find this palette matched what is shown online. As a fan of her UD collab, I was excited for these shadows. The smoky one did NOT disappoint! I can get so much range out of these 4 shadows. The wear time is great and I find the blendability to be similar to a Mac eyeshadow. I love that the black has a bit of shimmer to it. It isn’t glittery but it helps to make the look smokier or when used as a soft liner with a brush, less harsh. Definitely will try another palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely in love with this palette! It applies so smooth and no fall out! These are my general colors for daily wear and you the shades are buildable. This is now my new go to shadow palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m giving this 5 stars, here are a few point to help! 1. The colors look different in person. I got the one with a pink shimmer (app won’t select this one in color selection for review) and it is definitely warmer in person. I have seen the others in person and the colors in the pictures are definitely different.  2. This is hard to open. Not being picky, but I haven’t noticed this with most of my palettes and I did with this one, so worth mentioning.  3. Now for what matters, the formula. This is AMAZING. The mattes blend like a dream and work well together. The shimmers work best with a finger or wet brush and look so good on the eyes. The lightest shade literally makes it look like my lid is glowing.   I recommend this and I will definitely buy another!! I also bought this myself if that helps!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like I have to preface like everyone else with their love for Gwen but this was a fail for me. The colors were boring and while I was able to blend together an ok look, the colors aren’t exactly cohesive. There’s very little color payoff as well and they weren’t the most blendable. I love the idea of the refillable packaging but it just makes the quad feel cheap and flimsy. Save your money on these.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Simple Kind Of Life - matte neutral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this neutral palette. It’s perfect for everyday when I’m looking for a soft, natural look. Neutral shadows tend to pull too warm on me. This one gives just the right amount of definition and shading in tones that work on my cool, fair skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are completely different in real life. Huge disappoint as a big Gwen fan, especially because the UD x Gwen palette a few years ago was my favorite makeup palette ever, the colors were perfect for me. It seems like Gwen picked great colors but whoever is in charge of quality control really messed up. Contacted Sephora and they’re sending me a replacement, maybe I just got a bad one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are completely different in real life. Huge disappoint as a big Gwen fan, especially because the UD x Gwen palette a few years ago was my favorite makeup palette ever, the colors were perfect for me. It seems like Gwen picked great colors but whoever is in charge of quality control really messed up. Contacted Sephora and they’re sending me a replacement, maybe I just got a bad one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect everyday palette! Love the all matte look.Great color payoff. Looks amazing on Zoom meetings/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the rose gold quad. Such pretty colors. They applied beautifully over my primer and created a subtle, flattering look. Hoping to get one of the others soon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this palette (Simple Kind of Life).
